foreignNames.name: Змеиный Шип
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Змеиный Шип наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу, 3 повреждения другому целевому существу и 4 повреждения третьему целевому существу. Если существо, которому таким образом были нанесены повреждения, должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.

foreignNames.name: Perforación serpentina
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)La Perforación serpentina hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo, 3 puntos de daño a otra criatura objetivo y 4 puntos de daño a una tercera criatura objetivo. Si una criatura que recibió daño de esta manera fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.

cards.name: Serpentine Spike
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Serpentine Spike deals 2 damage to target creature, 3 damage to another target creature, and 4 damage to a third target creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Each target must be a different creature. You can’t cast Serpentine Spike without three different creatures available.
If one or two of those targets become illegal by the time Serpentine Spike resolves, you can’t change how much damage will be dealt to the remaining legal targets.
A creature doesn’t necessarily have to be dealt lethal damage by Serpentine Spike to be exiled. After being dealt damage, if it would die for any reason that turn, it’ll be exiled instead.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Serpentine Spike deals 2 damage to target creature, 3 damage to another target creature, and 4 damage to a third target creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: Some wounds never heal.

foreignNames.name: 虚空之触
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）虚空之触对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。如果本回合中曾以此法受到伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 有些伤口永远不会愈合。

foreignNames.name: 虛空之觸
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）虛空之觸對目標生物或玩家造成3點傷害。如果本回合中曾以此法受到傷害的生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 有些傷口永遠不會癒合。

foreignNames.name: Toucher du vide
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Le Toucher du vide inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Si une créature ayant subi des blessures de cette manière devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: Certaines blessures ne guérissent jamais.

foreignNames.name: Berührung der Leere
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Die Berührung der Leere fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls eine Kreatur, der auf diese Weise Schaden zugefügt wurde, in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor: Manche Wunden heilen nie.

foreignNames.name: Tocco del Vuoto
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Il Tocco del Vuoto infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Se una creatura a cui è stato inflitto danno in questo modo sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Alcune ferite non guariscono mai.

foreignNames.name: 虚空の接触
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。虚空の接触はそれに３点のダメージを与える。このターン、これによりダメージを与えられたクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreignNames.flavor: 決して癒えない傷もある。

foreignNames.name: 공허의 손길
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)생물 또는 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 공허의 손길은 그 목표에게 피해 3점을 입힌다. 이렇게 피해를 입은 생물이 이번 턴에 죽으려고 하면, 대신에 그 생물을 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 어떤 상처는 영원히 낫지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Toque do Vazio
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Toque do Vazio causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Se uma criatura que sofreu dano dessa maneira morreria neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.
foreignNames.flavor: Algumas feridas jamais se curam.

foreignNames.name: Прикосновение Пустоты
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Прикосновение Пустоты наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу или игроку. Если существо, которому таким образом были нанесены повреждения, должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.
foreignNames.flavor: Некоторые раны не заживают никогда.

foreignNames.name: Caricia del vacío
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)La Caricia del vacío hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Si una criatura que recibió daño de esta manera fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Algunas heridas no sanan nunca.

cards.name: Touch of the Void
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Touch of the Void deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: A creature doesn’t necessarily have to be dealt lethal damage by Touch of the Void to be exiled. After being dealt damage, if it would die for any reason that turn, it’ll be exiled instead.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Touch of the Void deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: "No, don't! Nal, it's me—"

foreignNames.name: 倒戈相向
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「不，住手！纳尔，是我啊～」

foreignNames.name: 倒戈相向
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）獲得目標生物的操控權直到回合結束。重置該生物。它獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「不，住手！納爾，是我啊—」

foreignNames.name: Reniement
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Acquérez le contrôle de la créature ciblée jusqu'à la fin du tour. Dégagez cette créature. Elle acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Non, je t'en prie ! Nal, c'est moi... »

foreignNames.name: Gegeneinander ausspielen
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Enttappe diese Kreatur. Sie erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Nein, nicht! Nal, ich bin's do…"

foreignNames.name: Rivoltarsi
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quella creatura. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "No, non farlo! Nal, sono io..."

foreignNames.name: 敵対
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それのコントロールを得る。そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「待て、やめろ！ナール、俺だ……。」

foreignNames.name: 등 돌리기
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)생물을 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 생물은 언탭되고 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "안돼, 멈춰! 날, 나란 말이야—"

foreignNames.name: Voltar-se Contra
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo até o final do turno. Desvire aquela criatura. Ela ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Não. Não! Nal, sou eu..."

foreignNames.name: Восстать Против
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Получите контроль над целевым существом до конца хода. Разверните то существо. Оно получает Ускорение до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Нет! Постой! Нэл, это же я!»

foreignNames.name: Traicionar
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Gana el control de la criatura objetivo hasta el final del turno. Endereza esa criatura. Gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡No lo hagas! Nal, ¡soy yo! ¡Soy y—".

cards.name: Turn Against
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

rulings.text: Turn Against can target any creature, even one that’s untapped or one you already control.
Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.

Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Emrakul has not been seen in months. Though her brood's numbers have dwindled in her absence, each drone is still a deadly threat.

foreignNames.name: 伊莫库残肢
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）践踏
foreignNames.flavor: 伊莫库已有多月未现身。虽然她孳生的巢群数量在日渐减少，但每一个奴兽都是致命的威胁。

foreignNames.name: 伊莫庫殘肢
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）踐踏
foreignNames.flavor: 伊莫庫已有數月未現身。雖然她孳生的巢群數量在日漸減少，但每一個奴獸都是致命的威脅。

foreignNames.name: Vestige d'Emrakul
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Piétinement
foreignNames.flavor: Cela fait des mois que personne n'a vu Emrakul. Sa progéniture a beau avoir décliné en son absence, chaque drone représente toujours une menace mortelle.

foreignNames.name: Abkömmling von Emrakul
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Verursacht Trampelschaden
foreignNames.flavor: Emrakul wurde seit Monaten nicht gesehen. Doch auch wenn seine Bruten in seiner Abwesenheit weniger geworden sind, so bleibt doch jede einzelne Drohne eine tödliche Bedrohung.

foreignNames.name: Vestigio di Emrakul
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Travolgere
foreignNames.flavor: Sono passati mesi dall'ultimo avvistamento di Emrakul. Anche se le file della sua covata si sono assottigliate in sua assenza, ogni parassita costituisce ancora una minaccia mortale.

foreignNames.name: エムラクールの名残
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）トランプル
foreignNames.flavor: エムラクールは何ヶ月も目撃されていない。その間に血統の数は減ったが、ドローンがいまだ脅威であることに変わりはない。

foreignNames.name: 엠라쿨의 잔재
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)돌진
foreignNames.flavor: 엠라쿨이 지난 몇 달간 보이지 않았다. 엠라쿨이 자리를 비운 사이 그녀의 새끼들 수는 줄었지만, 드론들은 여전히 매우 위협적인 존재이다.

foreignNames.name: Vestígio de Emrakul
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Atropelar
foreignNames.flavor: Emrakul não é vista há meses. Embora sua linhagem tenha diminuído em número em sua ausência, cada zangão ainda é uma ameaça mortal.

foreignNames.name: Частица Эмракул
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Пробивной удар
foreignNames.flavor: Эмракул не видели уже много месяцев. За это время численность ее выводка сократилась, но каждый дрон все еще несет смертельную опасность.

foreignNames.name: Vestigio de Emrakul
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Arrolla.
foreignNames.flavor: Hace meses que nadie ve a Emrakul. Aunque las filas de su especie han mermado desde su ausencia, cada zángano sigue siendo una amenaza letal.

cards.name: Vestige of Emrakul
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Trample

Devoid (This card has no color.)
Trample

foreignNames.name: 猛恶聚群体
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）猛恶聚群体的力量等同于由你操控的无色生物数量。践踏摄食（每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。）

foreignNames.name: 猛惡聚群體
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）猛惡聚群體的力量等同於由你操控的無色生物數量。踐踏攝食（每當此生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，該玩家放逐其牌庫頂牌。）

foreignNames.name: Agrégat abject
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)La force de l'Agrégat abject est égale au nombre de créatures incolores que vous contrôlez.PiétinementIngestion (À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur exile la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque.)

foreignNames.name: Verderbte Anhäufung
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Die Stärke der Verderbten Anhäufung ist gleich der Anzahl an farblosen Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst.Verursacht TrampelschadenZehren (Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, schickt dieser Spieler die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek ins Exil.)

foreignNames.name: Agglomerato Ignobile
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)La forza dell'Agglomerato Ignobile è pari al numero di creature incolori che controlli.TravolgereIngerire (Ogniqualvolta questa creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore esilia la prima carta del suo grimorio.)

foreignNames.name: 不快な集合体
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）不快な集合体のパワーは、あなたがコントロールする無色のクリーチャーの総数に等しい。トランプル嚥下（このクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードを追放する。）

foreignNames.name: 사악한 군집체
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)사악한 군집체의 공격력은 당신이 조종하는 무색 생물의 개수와 같다.돌진섭식 (이 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 추방한다.)

foreignNames.name: Agregado Vil
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)O poder de Agregado Vil é igual ao número de criaturas incolores que você controla.AtropelarIngerir (Toda vez que esta criatura causa dano de combate a um jogador, ele exila o card do topo do próprio grimório.)

foreignNames.name: Кошмарное Скопище
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Сила Кошмарного Скопища равна количеству бесцветных существ под вашим контролем.Пробивной ударЗаглатывание (Каждый раз, когда это существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок изгоняет верхнюю карту своей библиотеки.)

foreignNames.name: Agrupación repugnante
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)La fuerza de la Agrupación repugnante es igual a la cantidad de criaturas incoloras que controlas.Arrolla.Ingerir. (Siempre que esta criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador exilia la primera carta de su biblioteca.)

cards.name: Vile Aggregate
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Vile Aggregate's power is equal to the number of colorless creatures you control.TrampleIngest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

rulings.text: The ability that defines Vile Aggregate’s power works in all zones, not just the battlefield. If Vile Aggregate is on the battlefield, it will count itself.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
The card exiled by the ingest ability is exiled face up.
If the player has no cards in his or her library when the ingest ability resolves, nothing happens. That player won’t lose the game (until he or she has to draw a card from an empty library).

Vile Aggregate's power is equal to the number of colorless creatures you control.
Trample
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

foreignNames.name: 阿库姆火鸟
foreignNames.text: 飞行，敏捷阿库姆火鸟每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{4}{R}{R}。若你如此作，则将阿库姆火鸟从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreignNames.name: 阿庫姆火鳥
foreignNames.text: 飛行，敏捷阿庫姆火鳥每回合若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以支付{4}{R}{R}。若你如此作，則將阿庫姆火鳥從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

foreignNames.name: Oiseau de feu d'Akoum
foreignNames.text: Vol, céléritéL'Oiseau de feu d'Akoum attaque à chaque tour si possible.Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous pouvez payer {4}{R}{R}. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez l'Oiseau de feu d'Akoum sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière.

foreignNames.name: Akoum-Feuervogel
foreignNames.text: Fliegend, EileDer Akoum-Feuervogel greift in jedem Zug an, falls möglich.Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kannst du {4}{R}{R} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe den Akoum-Feuervogel aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignNames.name: Pirofenice di Akoum
foreignNames.text: Volare, rapiditàLa Pirofenice di Akoum attacca ogni turno, se può farlo.Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, puoi pagare {4}{R}{R}. Se lo fai, rimetti sul campo di battaglia la Pirofenice di Akoum dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: アクームの火の鳥
foreignNames.text: 飛行、速攻毎ターン、アクームの火の鳥は可能なら攻撃する。上陸 — 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは{4}{R}{R}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、あなたの墓地からアクームの火の鳥を戦場に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 아쿰 불새

cards.name: Akoum Firebird
cards.originalText: Flying, hasteAkoum Firebird attacks each turn if able.Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {4}{R}{R}. If you do, return Akoum Firebird from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: If, during its controller’s declare attackers step, Akoum Firebird is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having it attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If he or she doesn’t, Akoum Firebird doesn’t have to attack.
The landfall ability triggers only if Akoum Firebird is in your graveyard at the moment the land enters the battlefield.
Players can respond to the triggered ability, but once it starts resolving and you decide whether to pay {4}{R}{R}, it’s too late for anyone to respond.

A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

foreignNames.name: 아쿰 지옥룡

cards.name: Boiling Earth
cards.originalText: Boiling Earth deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.Awaken 4—{6}{R} (If you cast this spell for {6}{R}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

rulings.text: You can cast a spell with awaken for its mana cost and get only its first effect. If you cast a spell for its awaken cost, you’ll get both effects.

If the non-awaken part of the spell requires a target, you must choose a legal target. You can’t cast the spell if you can’t choose a legal target for each instance of the word “target” (though you only need a legal target for the awaken ability if you’re casting the spell for its awaken cost).

If a spell with awaken has multiple targets (including the land you control), and some but not all of those targets become illegal by the time the spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t affect the illegal targets in any way.

If the non-awaken part of the spell doesn’t require a target and you cast the spell for its awaken cost, then the spell will be countered if the target land you control becomes illegal before the spell resolves (such as due to being destroyed in response to the spell being cast).

The land will retain any other types, subtypes, or supertypes it previously had. It will also retain any mana abilities it had as a result of those subtypes. For example, a Forest that’s turned into a creature this way can still be tapped for {G}.
Awaken doesn’t give the land you control a color. As most lands are colorless, in most cases the resulting land creature will also be colorless.

cards.name: Makindi Sliderunner
cards.originalText: TrampleLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Makindi Sliderunner gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Radiant Flames
cards.originalText: Converge — Radiant Flames deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Radiant Flames.

rulings.text: The maximum number of colors of mana you can spend to cast a spell is five. Colorless is not a color. Note that the cost of a spell with converge may limit how many colors of mana you can spend.

If there are any alternative or additional costs to cast a spell with a converge ability, the mana spent to pay those costs will count. For example, if an effect makes sorcery spells cost {1} more to cast, you could pay {W}{U}{B}{R} to cast Radiant Flames and deal 4 damage to each creature.

If you cast a spell with converge without spending any mana to cast it (perhaps because an effect allowed you to cast it without paying its mana cost), then the number of colors spent to cast it will be zero.

If a spell with a converge ability is copied, no mana was spent to cast the copy, so the number of colors of mana spent to cast the spell will be zero. The number of colors spent to cast the original spell is not copied.

cards.name: Reckless Cohort
cards.originalText: Reckless Cohort attacks each combat if able unless you control another Ally.

rulings.text: Reckless Cohort can attack if you control another Ally. It just isn’t forced to.
Reckless Cohort checks whether you control another Ally as attacking creatures are declared. At that time, if you don’t, Reckless Cohort attacks if able.

If, during its controller’s declare attackers step, that player doesn’t control another Ally but Reckless Cohort is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under that player’s control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having Reckless Cohort attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If he or she doesn’t, Reckless Cohort doesn’t have to attack.

cards.name: Retreat to Valakut
cards.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.• Target creature can't block this turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Rolling Thunder
cards.originalText: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: If X is greater than 0, you can't choose zero targets. You must choose between one and X targets. If X is 0, you can’t choose any targets.
You choose how many targets Rolling Thunder has and how the damage is divided as you cast the spell. Each target must receive at least 1 damage.

If some, but not all, of the targets become illegal by the time Rolling Thunder tries to resolve, the original division of damage still applies, but no damage is dealt to illegal targets. If all the targets are illegal, the spell will be countered.
If Rolling Thunder is copied, the copy will retain the original damage divsion. The spell or ability will likely allow you to choose new targets, but you can’t change the way damage is divided.

cards.name: Valakut Predator
cards.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Valakut Predator gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
cards.originalText: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

rulings.text: The ability triggers whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada and no other object or player.

If you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has multiple targets, but it’s targeting only Zada with all of them, Zada’s ability will trigger. The copies will similarly each be targeting only one of your other creatures. You can’t change any of the copy’s targets to other creatures.
Any creature you control that couldn’t be targeted by the original spell (due to shroud, protection abilities, targeting restrictions, or any other reason) is just ignored by Zada’s ability.
You control all the copies. You choose the order the copies are put onto the stack. The original spell will be on the stack beneath those copies and will resolve last.
The copies that the ability creates are created on the stack, so they’re not cast. Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell (like Zada’s ability itself) won’t trigger.
If the spell that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copies will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell that’s copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast (like Rolling Thunder does), the copies have the same value of X.

The controller of a copy can’t choose to pay any alternative or additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any alternative or additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy.

cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

cards.name: Blisterpod
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)When Blisterpod dies, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {1} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）當孳巢監衛進戰場時，將三個1/1無色奧札奇／孽裔衍生生物放進戰場。它們具有「犧牲此生物：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 母性的溫柔。螳螂的憐憫。

foreignNames.name: Surveillant de progéniture
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Quand le Surveillant de progéniture arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille trois jetons de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. Ils ont « Sacrifiez cette créature : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve. »
foreignNames.flavor: La tendresse d'une mère. La compassion d'une mante.

foreignNames.name: Brutüberwacher
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Wenn der Brutüberwacher ins Spiel kommt, bringe drei 1/1 farblose Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie haben „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."
foreignNames.flavor: Die Zärtlichkeit einer Mutter. Das Mitleid einer Gottesanbeterin.

foreignNames.name: Sorvegliante della Covata
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Quando la Sorvegliante della Covata entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia tre pedine creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolori. Hanno "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: L'affetto di una madre. La misericordia di una mantide.

foreignNames.name: 血統の観察者
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）血統の観察者が戦場に出たとき、無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを３体戦場に出す。それらは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: 母親の愛情。蟷螂の同情。

foreignNames.name: 무리 감시자
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)무리 감시자가 전장에 들어올 때, 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 세 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물들은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 어머니의 자애. 사마귀의 비애.

foreignNames.name: Monitorador da Prole
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Quando Monitorador da Prole entrar no campo de batalha, coloque no campo de batalha três fichas de criatura incolores 1/1 do tipo Rebento Eldrazi. Elas têm "Sacrifique esta criatura: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: A ternura de uma mãe. A piedade de um louva-a-deus.

foreignNames.name: Смотритель Выводка
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Когда Смотритель Выводка выходит на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы три фишки существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Они имеют способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Нежность матери. Милосердие богомола.

foreignNames.name: Vigilante de la progenie
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Cuando el Vigilante de la progenie entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla tres fichas de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incoloras 1/1. Tienen "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: La ternura de una madre. La piedad de una mantis religiosa.

cards.name: Brood Monitor
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)When Brood Monitor enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {1} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Brood Monitor enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.

foreignNames.name: 召唤孽裔
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）将两个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 钨拉莫的后代布满大地，它们汲取赞迪卡的法术力来满足这个巨物的无尽饥渴。

foreignNames.name: 召喚孽裔
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）將兩個1/1無色奧札奇／孽裔衍生生物放進戰場。它們具有「犧牲此生物：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 鎢拉莫的後代布滿大地，它們汲取贊迪卡的魔法力來滿足這個巨物的無盡飢渴。

foreignNames.name: Appel des scions
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. Ils ont « Sacrifiez cette créature : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve. »
foreignNames.flavor: La progéniture d'Ulamog pullule et draine le mana de Zendikar pour apaiser la faim insatiable du titan.

foreignNames.name: Herbeirufen der Brut
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Bringe zwei 1/1 farblose Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie haben „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."
foreignNames.flavor: Überall im Land wimmelt es von Ulamogs Abkömmlingen, die Zendikars Mana absaugen, um den riesigen Hunger des Titanen zu stillen.

foreignNames.name: Invocare i Discendenti
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolori. Hanno "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: La prole di Ulamog brulica sulla terra, prosciugando il mana di Zendikar per nutrire la fame insaziabile del titano.

foreignNames.name: 末裔の呼び出し
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。それらは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: ウラモグの子孫が大地にあふれ、巨人の飢餓を満たすためにゼンディカーのマナを貪る。

foreignNames.name: 자손 부르기
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물들은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 대지를 뒤덮은 울라목의 자손이 거신의 끝없는 배고픔을 채우기 위해 젠디카르의 마나를 바닥내고 있다.

foreignNames.name: Chamado aos Rebentos
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura incolores 1/1 do tipo Rebento Eldrazi. Elas têm "Sacrifique esta criatura: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: A prole de Ulamog assola a terra, drenando o mana de Zendikar para alimentar a fome insaciável do titã.

foreignNames.name: Созыв Отпрысков
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Они имеют способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Отпрыски Уламога заполонили землю и вытягивают из нее ману, чтобы утолить ненасытный голод титана.

foreignNames.name: Llamar a los vástagos
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incoloras 1/1. Tienen "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: La progenie de Ulamog se extendió por Zendikar y absorbió su maná para apaciguar el hambre insaciable del titán.

cards.name: Call the Scions
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Put two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

Put two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: Every Eldrazi in Ulamog's lineage is an extension of the titan's will.

foreignNames.name: 无目看守
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）当无目看守进战场时，将两个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 钨拉莫孳生的每一个奥札奇都承袭了这个巨物的意志。

foreignNames.name: 無目看守
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）當無目看守進戰場時，將兩個1/1無色奧札奇／孽裔衍生生物放進戰場。它們具有「犧牲此生物：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 鎢拉莫孳生的每一個奧札奇都承襲了這個巨物的意志。

foreignNames.name: Gardien anophtalme
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Quand le Gardien anophtalme arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. Ils ont « Sacrifiez cette créature : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve. »
foreignNames.flavor: Chaque Eldrazi de la lignée d'Ulamog est une extension de la volonté du titan.

foreignNames.name: Blinder Beobachter
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Wenn der Blinde Beobachter ins Spiel kommt, bringe zwei 1/1 farblose Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie haben „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."
foreignNames.flavor: Jeder von Ulamog abstammende Eldrazi ist eine Erweiterung seines Willens.

foreignNames.name: Osservatore Senz'Occhi
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Quando l'Osservatore Senz'Occhi entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolori. Hanno "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: Ogni Eldrazi della covata di Ulamog è un'estensione della volontà del titano.

foreignNames.name: 目なしの見張り
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）目なしの見張りが戦場に出たとき、無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。それらは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: ウラモグの血族に連なるエルドラージはみな、その意思を受け継いでいる。

foreignNames.name: 눈없는 감시자
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)눈없는 감시자가 전장에 들어올 때, 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물들은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 울라목 혈족의 모든 엘드라지는 확장된 거신의 의지이다.

foreignNames.name: Vigia sem Olhos
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Quando Vigia sem Olhos entrar no campo de batalha, coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura incolores 1/1 do tipo Rebento Eldrazi. Elas têm "Sacrifique esta criatura: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: Cada Eldrazi da linhagem de Ulamog é uma extensão da vontade do titã.

foreignNames.name: Безглазый Наблюдатель
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Когда Безглазый Наблюдатель выходит на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Они имеют способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Каждый Эльдрази из рода Уламога претворяет в жизнь волю титана.

foreignNames.name: Vigilante sin ojos
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Cuando el Vigilante sin ojos entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incoloras 1/1. Tienen "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: Todos los Eldrazi de la estirpe de Ulamog son una extensión de la voluntad del titán.

foreignNames.name: 异境造物
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）在你的维持开始时，将一个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」{1}{G}，牺牲异境造物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张奥札奇牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 異境造物

foreignNames.name: Aux portes de l'au-delà
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Au début de votre entretien, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. foreignNames.name: Aus dem Jenseits
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Bringe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments einen 1/1 farblosen Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Er hat „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."{1}{G}, opfere Aus dem Jenseits: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Eldrazi-Karte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Da Altrove
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolore. Ha "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".{1}{G}, Sacrifica Da Altrove: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Eldrazi, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 彼方より
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）あなたのアップキープの開始時に、無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。それは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。{1}{G}, 彼方よりを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーからエルドラージ・カードを１枚探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 저편의 존재
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)당신의 유지단 시작에, 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.{1}{G}, 저편의 존재를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 엘드라지 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개한 후, 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그 후 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Do Além
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)No início de sua manutenção, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura incolor 1/1 do tipo Rebento Eldrazi. Ela tem "Sacrifique esta criatura: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.".{1}{G}, Sacrifique Do Além: Procure um card do tipo Eldrazi em seu grimório, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e depois embaralhe o seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: С Той Стороны
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)В начале вашего шага поддержки положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Она имеет способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».{1}{G}, пожертвуйте С Той Стороны: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Эльдрази, покажите ее, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: Desde el más allá
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incolora 1/1. Tiene "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".{1}{G}, sacrificar Desde el más allá: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de Eldrazi, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

cards.name: From Beyond
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."{1}{G}, Sacrifice From Beyond: Search your library for an Eldrazi card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: An Eldrazi card is one with the creature type Eldrazi. Just having “Eldrazi” in its name or being an Eldrazi-themed card doesn’t count.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {1} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
{1}{G}, Sacrifice From Beyond: Search your library for an Eldrazi card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The battle served as a grim reminder of what a final victory for the Eldrazi would mean.

foreignNames.name: 异常侵略性
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）目标由你操控的生物与目标由对手操控的生物互斗。如果本回合中前述由对手操控的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 奥札奇最终得胜后会是怎样的惨烈景象，从这场争斗当中便可见一斑。

foreignNames.name: 異常侵略性
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）目標由你操控的生物與目標由對手操控的生物互鬥。如果本回合中前述由對手操控的生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 奧札奇最終得勝後會是怎樣的慘烈景象，從這場爭鬥當中便可見一斑。

foreignNames.name: Agressivité surnaturelle
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez se bat contre une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. Si la créature qu'un adversaire contrôle devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: Le combat donna un cruel aperçu de ce qu'impliquerait la victoire totale des Eldrazi.

foreignNames.name: Unnatürliche Aggression
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, kämpft gegen eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Falls die Kreatur, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor: Dieser Kampf diente auf grauenvolle Weise als Erinnerung daran, was ein endgültiger Sieg der Eldrazi bedeuten würde.

foreignNames.name: Aggressione Innaturale
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Una creatura bersaglio che controlli lotta con una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. Se la creatura controllata da un avversario sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Lo scontro servì come lugubre monito di ciò che la vittoria finale degli Eldrazi avrebbe potuto significare.

foreignNames.name: 異常な攻撃性
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体と対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者と格闘を行う。このターンにその後者が死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreignNames.flavor: 最終的にエルドラージが勝利すればどうなるか、この戦いは残酷な事実を教えてくれた。

foreignNames.name: 기괴한 공격성
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)당신이 조종하는 생물과 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 두 생물은 서로 싸운다. 상대가 조종하는 그 생물이 이번 턴에 죽게 된다면, 대신에 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 전투는 엘드라지에 대한 최후의 승리가 무엇을 의미하는지 암울하게 상기시킨다.

foreignNames.name: Agressão Antinatural
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)A criatura alvo que você controla luta contra a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. Se a criatura que o oponente controla morreria neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.
foreignNames.flavor: A batalha serviu como um lembrete cruel do que uma vitória final dos Eldrazi significaria.

foreignNames.name: Чужеродная Агрессия
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Целевое существо под вашим контролем дерется с целевым существом под контролем оппонента. Если то существо под контролем оппонента должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.
foreignNames.flavor: Эта битва стала мрачным напоминанием о том, что принесет окончательная победа Эльдрази.

foreignNames.name: Agresión antinatural
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)La criatura objetivo que controlas lucha contra la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. Si la criatura que controla un oponente fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.
foreignNames.flavor: La batalla sirvió como recordatorio siniestro de lo que supondría una victoria final de los Eldrazi.

cards.name: Unnatural Aggression
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. If the creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: If the creature an opponent controls survives the fight but would die later in the turn for another reason, it will be exiled instead, whether your creature dealt it damage or not.

If the creature you control becomes an illegal target (perhaps due to being destroyed by another spell or ability), Unnatural Aggression will resolve, but the target creature an opponent controls will neither deal nor receive any damage. If that creature would die later in the turn for another reason, it will be exiled instead.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. If the creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: The Eldrazi don't merely extinguish life—they supplant it.

foreignNames.name: 虚空侍从
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）{1}{G}，将一张由对手拥有的牌从放逐区置入该牌手的坟墓场：将一个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 奥札奇不只是灭绝生命～它们取而代之。

foreignNames.name: 虛空侍從
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）{1}{G}，將一張由對手擁有的牌從放逐區置入該玩家的墳墓場：將一個1/1無色奧札奇／孽裔衍生生物放進戰場。它具有「犧牲此生物：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 奧札奇不只是滅絕生命～它們取而代之。

foreignNames.name: Suivant du vide
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.){1}{G}, mettez une carte qu'un adversaire possède dans le cimetière de ce joueur depuis l'exil : Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. Il a « Sacrifiez cette créature : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve. »
foreignNames.flavor: Les Eldrazi ne se contentent pas d'effacer toute vie, ils la supplantent.

foreignNames.name: Diener der Leere
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.){1}{G}, lege eine Karte, die ein Gegner besitzt, aus dem Exil auf den Friedhof dieses Spielers: Bringe einen 1/1 farblosen Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Er hat „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."
foreignNames.flavor: Die Eldrazi löschen Leben nicht einfach aus … sie ersetzen es.

foreignNames.name: Servitore del Vuoto
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.){1}{G}, Metti una carta posseduta da un avversario dall'esilio nel cimitero di quel giocatore: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolore. Ha "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: Gli Eldrazi non si limitano a sopprimere la vita: la soppiantano.

foreignNames.name: 虚空の従者
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）{1}{G}, 追放領域から対戦相手がオーナーであるカードを１枚そのプレイヤーの墓地に置く：無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。それは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: エルドラージは生命を消し去るだけではない。それに取って代わるのだ。

foreignNames.name: 공허의 수행원
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.){1}{G}, 추방 영역에서 상대가 소유한 카드 한 장을 그 플레이어의 무덤에 넣는다: 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 엘드라지는 단순히 생명을 없애는 게 아니라 그것을 대체한다.

foreignNames.name: Assistente do Vazio
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.){1}{G}, Coloque um card exilado de um oponente no cemitério dele: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura incolor 1/1 do tipo Rebento Eldrazi. Ela tem "Sacrifique esta criatura: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.".
foreignNames.flavor: Os Eldrazi não extinguem meramente a vida — eles a suplantam.

foreignNames.name: Блюститель Пустоты
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.){1}{G}, положите принадлежащую оппоненту карту из изгнания на кладбище того игрока: положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Она имеет способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Эльдрази не просто уничтожают жизнь — они занимают ее место.

foreignNames.name: Asistente del vacío
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.){1}{G}, poner una carta del exilio que controla un oponente en el cementerio de ese jugador: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incolora 1/1. Tiene "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: Los Eldrazi no se limitan a extinguir la vida: la suplantan.

cards.name: Void Attendant
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.){1}{G}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re activating this ability, players can’t respond until after you have paid its costs and completed activating it. Specifically, no one can try to remove the card from exile to stop you from activating the ability.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
If a spell or ability requires that you put more than one exiled card into the graveyard, you may choose cards owned by different opponents. Each card chosen will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

If a replacement effect will cause cards that would be put into a graveyard from anywhere to be exiled instead (such as the one created by Anafenza, the Foremost), you can still put an exiled card into its opponent’s graveyard. The card becomes a new object and remains in exile. In this situation, you can’t use a single exiled card if required to put more than one exiled card into the graveyard. Conversely, you could use the same card in this situation if two separate spells or abilities each required you to put a single exiled card into its owner’s graveyard.
You can’t look at face-down cards in exile unless an effect allows you to.

Face-down cards in exile are grouped using two criteria: what caused them to be exiled face down and when they were exiled face down. If you want to put a face-down card in exile into its owner’s graveyard, you must first choose one of these groups and then choose a card from within that group at random. For example, say an artifact causes your opponent to exile his or her hand of three cards face down. Then on a later turn, that artifact causes your opponent to exile another two cards face down. If you use Wasteland Strangler to put one of those cards into his or her graveyard, you would pick the first or second pile and put a card chosen at random from that pile into the graveyard.
Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {1} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}{G}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: "They come because I call. They stay because I listen."

foreignNames.name: 召兽学者
foreignNames.text: 敏捷{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。 此法术力只能用来施放生物咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「因我呼唤，它们前来。因我倾听，它们留下。」

foreignNames.name: 召獸學者
foreignNames.text: 敏捷{T}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。此魔法力只能用來施放生物咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「因我呼喚，牠們前來。因我傾聽，牠們留下。」

foreignNames.name: Savant meneur des bêtes
foreignNames.text: Célérité{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer un sort de créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ils viennent parce que je les appelle. Ils restent parce que je les écoute. »

foreignNames.name: Bestienrufer-Experte
foreignNames.text: Eile{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um einen Kreaturenzauber zu wirken.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie kommen, weil ich rufe. Sie bleiben, weil ich zuhöre."

foreignNames.name: Evocabestie Sapiente
foreignNames.text: Rapidità{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare una magia creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vengono perché io le chiamo. Restano perché io le ascolto."

foreignNames.name: 獣呼びの学者
foreignNames.text: 速攻{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。このマナは、クリーチャー・呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用できる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「私が呼べば来る。私が聴けば留まる。」

foreignNames.name: 야수소환술 석학
foreignNames.text: 신속{T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. 이 마나는 생물 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내가 부르니 그들이 온다. 내가 귀 기울이니 그들이 머무른다."

foreignNames.name: Sábio Convocador de Feras
foreignNames.text: Ímpeto{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana. Gaste este mana somente para conjurar mágicas de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Elas vêm porque eu chamo. Elas ficam porque eu escuto."

foreignNames.name: Мудрый Призыватель Зверей
foreignNames.text: Ускорение{T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинания существа.
foreignNames.flavor: «Они приходят, потому что я зову. Они остаются, потому что я слушаю».

foreignNames.name: Sabio llamabestias
foreignNames.text: Prisa.{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná. Usa este maná solo para lanzar un hechizo de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vienen porque los llamo. Se quedan porque los escucho".

cards.name: Beastcaller Savant
cards.originalText: Haste{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

rulings.text: Mana produced by Beastcaller Savant can be spent on any part of a creature spell’s total cost, including additional costs (such as kicker costs) and alternative costs (such as dash costs). It can’t be spent to pay the costs of abilities of creatures you control.
Mana produced by Beastcaller Savant can’t be used to activate an ability or cast an instant or sorcery spell that creates creature tokens.

cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

cards.flavor: The native creatures of Zendikar have adapted to live under rocks and crawl through underbrush in order to avoid the most voracious predators. The Eldrazi have yet to make such adjustments.

foreignNames.name: 猎巢亚龙
foreignNames.flavor: 赞迪卡的原生物种为了躲避贪餍的捕食者，已经适应了在石块下生活并在灌丛中穿梭；但奥札奇还未适应。

foreignNames.name: 獵巢亞龍
foreignNames.flavor: 贊迪卡的原生物種為了躲避貪饜的捕食者，已經適應了在石塊下生活並在灌叢中穿梭；但奧札奇尚未適應。

foreignNames.name: Guivre traque-progéniture
foreignNames.flavor: Les créatures originaires de Zendikar s'étaient adaptées pour vivre sous les rochers et ramper dans les taillis afin d'échapper aux prédateurs les plus voraces. Les Eldrazi, eux, n'avaient pas encore eu le temps.

foreignNames.name: Brutjägerwurm
foreignNames.flavor: Die natürliche Fauna Zendikars hat sich angepasst und versteckt sich unter Steinen oder im Unterholz, um den gefährlichsten Räubern zu entgehen. Die Eldrazi müssen sich erst noch anpassen.

foreignNames.name: Wurm Razziacovata
foreignNames.flavor: Le creature native di Zendikar si sono adattate a vivere sotto le rocce e a strisciare nel sottobosco per evitare i predatori più voraci. Gli Eldrazi non hanno ancora preso queste precauzioni.

foreignNames.name: 血統絶やしのワーム
foreignNames.flavor: ゼンディカー固有の生物は、貪欲な捕食者を避けるため、岩の下に棲み薮の中を這うようになった。エルドラージはそのような順応を行わない。

foreignNames.name: 무리사냥꾼 웜
foreignNames.flavor: 젠디카르 태생의 생물들은 잔혹한 포식자를 피하기 위해 바위 아래에서 살면서 덤불 사이를 기어 다니는 삶에 적응했다. 엘드라지는 아직 이런 삶에 적응되지 않았다.

foreignNames.name: Vorme Caçador da Prole
foreignNames.flavor: As criaturas nativas de Zendikar se adaptaram a viver sob as rochas e rastejar pela vegetação rasteira para evitar os predadores mais vorazes. Os Eldrazi ainda precisam fazer tais ajustes.

foreignNames.name: Вурм-Пожиратель Выводков
foreignNames.flavor: Уроженцы Зендикара научились прятаться под камнями и пробираться через подлесок, чтобы не попадаться самым прожорливым из хищников. Эльдрази же еще не успели приспособиться.

foreignNames.name: Sierpe cazaprogenie
foreignNames.flavor: Las criaturas nativas de Zendikar se han adaptado a vivir bajo las rocas y a deslizarse entre la maleza para evitar a los predadores más voraces. Los Eldrazi aún no han evolucionado en este sentido.

cards.name: Broodhunter Wurm

foreignNames.name: 土石武装
foreignNames.text: 在目标永久物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。醒转4～{6}{G}（如果你支付{6}{G}来施放此咒语，则另在目标由你操控的地上放置四个+1/+1指示物，且它成为0/0，具敏捷异能的元素生物。它仍然是地。）

foreignNames.name: 土石武裝

cards.name: Earthen Arms
cards.originalText: Put two +1/+1 counters on target permanent.Awaken 4—{6}{G} (If you cast this spell for {6}{G}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

rulings.text: Any permanent can have a +1/+1 counter put on it. Those counters won’t have any effect unless that permanent is or becomes a creature.
If you cast Earthen Arms for its awaken cost, a land you control can be both targets.
You can cast a spell with awaken for its mana cost and get only its first effect. If you cast a spell for its awaken cost, you’ll get both effects.

If the non-awaken part of the spell requires a target, you must choose a legal target. You can’t cast the spell if you can’t choose a legal target for each instance of the word “target” (though you only need a legal target for the awaken ability if you’re casting the spell for its awaken cost).

If a spell with awaken has multiple targets (including the land you control), and some but not all of those targets become illegal by the time the spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t affect the illegal targets in any way.

If the non-awaken part of the spell doesn’t require a target and you cast the spell for its awaken cost, then the spell will be countered if the target land you control becomes illegal before the spell resolves (such as due to being destroyed in response to the spell being cast).

The land will retain any other types, subtypes, or supertypes it previously had. It will also retain any mana abilities it had as a result of those subtypes. For example, a Forest that’s turned into a creature this way can still be tapped for {G}.
Awaken doesn’t give the land you control a color. As most lands are colorless, in most cases the resulting land creature will also be colorless.

cards.name: Infuse with the Elements
cards.originalText: Converge — Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Infuse with the Elements. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: The maximum number of colors of mana you can spend to cast a spell is five. Colorless is not a color. Note that the cost of a spell with converge may limit how many colors of mana you can spend.

If there are any alternative or additional costs to cast a spell with a converge ability, the mana spent to pay those costs will count. For example, if an effect makes sorcery spells cost {1} more to cast, you could pay {W}{U}{B}{R} to cast Radiant Flames and deal 4 damage to each creature.

If you cast a spell with converge without spending any mana to cast it (perhaps because an effect allowed you to cast it without paying its mana cost), then the number of colors spent to cast it will be zero.

If a spell with a converge ability is copied, no mana was spent to cast the copy, so the number of colors of mana spent to cast the spell will be zero. The number of colors spent to cast the original spell is not copied.

cards.text: Converge — Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Infuse with the Elements. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Jaddi Offshoot
cards.originalText: DefenderLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Retreat to Kazandu
cards.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.• You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Snapping Gnarlid
cards.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Gnarlid gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Tajuru Stalwart
cards.originalText: Converge — Tajuru Stalwart enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

rulings.text: The maximum number of colors of mana you can spend to cast a spell is five. Colorless is not a color. Note that the cost of a spell with converge may limit how many colors of mana you can spend.

If there are any alternative or additional costs to cast a spell with a converge ability, the mana spent to pay those costs will count. For example, if an effect makes sorcery spells cost {1} more to cast, you could pay {W}{U}{B}{R} to cast Radiant Flames and deal 4 damage to each creature.

If you cast a spell with converge without spending any mana to cast it (perhaps because an effect allowed you to cast it without paying its mana cost), then the number of colors spent to cast it will be zero.

If a spell with a converge ability is copied, no mana was spent to cast the copy, so the number of colors of mana spent to cast the spell will be zero. The number of colors spent to cast the original spell is not copied.

cards.name: Territorial Baloth
cards.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: The landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability (such as Rampant Growth) causes you to put a land onto the battlefield under your control. It will even trigger when a spell or ability causes another player to put a land onto the battlefield under your control (as can happen with Yavimaya Dryad's ability, for example).

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

If damage that can’t be prevented is dealt to Undergrowth Champion while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, you’ll still remove a +1/+1 counter on it.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {1} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

cards.name: Brutal Expulsion
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Choose one or both —• Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.• Brutal Expulsion deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: If a spell is returned to its owner’s hand, it’s removed from the stack. The spell isn’t countered, but it won’t resolve. If a copy of a spell is returned to a hand this way, the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed.

The second mode will exile the target creature or planeswalker if it would be put into the graveyard this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage. The exile effect applies to that permanent even if Brutal Expulsion deals no damage to it (due to a prevention effect) or Brutal Expulsion deals damage to a different creature or planeswalker (due to a redirection effect).

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
