foreignNames.name: Охотник из Праха
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Ускорение В начале каждого заключительного шага, если под вашим контролем нет других бесцветных существ, верните Охотника из Праха в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Единственные следы, которые он оставляет, — бесшумные порывы ветра и невероятное количество обломков.

foreignNames.name: Acechador del polvo
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Prisa.Al comienzo de cada paso final, si no controlas ninguna otra criatura incolora, regresa el Acechador del polvo a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: El único rastro que deja a su paso son ráfagas de viento silenciosas y enormes pilas de restos.

cards.name: Dust Stalker
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)HasteAt the beginning of each end step, if you control no other colorless creatures, return Dust Stalker to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Dust Stalker’s last ability checks to see if you control another colorless creature as the end step begins. If you do, the ability won’t trigger. If you don’t, the ability will check again as it tries to resolve. If you somehow control another colorless creature at that time, the ability won’t do anything. You won’t return Dust Stalker to its owner’s hand.
Dust Stalker’s last ability doesn’t depend on Dust Stalker being colorless. If it gains one or more colors, the ability will still look for another creature you control that’s colorless.
Like most abilities, Dust Stalker’s last ability functions only while Dust Stalker is on the battlefield.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Haste
At the beginning of each end step, if you control no other colorless creatures, return Dust Stalker to its owner's hand.

foreignNames.name: 深海噬体
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）死触摄食（每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。）{3}{U}{B}：抓一张牌。每位对手各放逐其牌库顶牌。

foreignNames.name: 深海噬體
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）死觸攝食（每當此生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，該玩家放逐其牌庫頂牌。）{3}{U}{B}：抽一張牌。每位對手各放逐其牌庫頂牌。

foreignNames.name: Charognard des fonds marins
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Contact mortelIngestion (À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur exile la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque.){3}{U}{B}: Piochez une carte. Chaque adversaire exile la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Tiefseefresser
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)TodesberührungZehren (Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, schickt dieser Spieler die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek ins Exil.){3}{U}{B}: Ziehe eine Karte. Jeder Gegner schickt die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek ins Exil.

foreignNames.name: Divoratore delle Profondità
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Tocco letaleIngerire (Ogniqualvolta questa creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore esilia la prima carta del suo grimorio.){3}{U}{B}: Pesca una carta. Ogni avversario esilia la prima carta del proprio grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 深水の大喰らい
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）接死嚥下（このクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードを追放する。）{3}{U}{B}：カードを１枚引く。各対戦相手はそれぞれ自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードを追放する。

foreignNames.name: 물속의 포식자
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)치명타섭식 (이 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 추방한다.){3}{U}{B}: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 각 상대는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 추방한다.

foreignNames.name: Alimentador das Profundezas
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Toque mortíferoIngerir (Toda vez que esta criatura causa dano de combate a um jogador, ele exila o card do topo do próprio grimório.){3}{U}{B}: Compre um card. Cada oponente exila o card do topo do próprio grimório.

foreignNames.name: Пожиратель из Бездны
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Смертельное касаниеЗаглатывание (Каждый раз, когда это существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок изгоняет верхнюю карту своей библиотеки.){3}{U}{B}: возьмите карту. Каждый оппонент изгоняет верхнюю карту своей библиотеки.

foreignNames.name: Comedor de las profundidades
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Toque mortal.Ingerir. (Siempre que esta criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador exilia la primera carta de su biblioteca.){3}{U}{B}: Roba una carta. Cada oponente exilia la primera carta de su biblioteca.

cards.name: Fathom Feeder
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)DeathtouchIngest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.){3}{U}{B}: Draw a card. Each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
The card exiled by the ingest ability is exiled face up.
If the player has no cards in his or her library when the ingest ability resolves, nothing happens. That player won’t lose the game (until he or she has to draw a card from an empty library).

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Deathtouch
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)
{3}{U}{B}: Draw a card. Each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library.

cards.flavor: "While we delay, they're on the move. They will not wait as we bicker. We are losing this war by moments as our goal slips beyond our reach."—Gideon Jura

foreignNames.name: 屠杀锋体
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）{1}：目标无色生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们在这耽搁，而它们在行动。它们可不会等我们在这费口舌。战争的局势愈发不妙，目标离我们遥不可及。」～基定尤拉

foreignNames.name: 屠殺鋒體
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）{1}：目標無色生物獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我們在這耽擱，而它們在行動。它們可不會等我們在這費口舌。戰爭的局勢愈發不妙，目標離我們遙不可及。」～基定尤拉

foreignNames.name: Précurseur du massacre
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.){1} : La créature incolore ciblée acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Pendant que nous gaspillons notre temps, ils avancent. Ils n'attendront pas que nous réglions nos petites querelles. C'est nos chances de gagner cette guerre que nous perdons quand nous oublions notre objectif. »—Gideon Jura

foreignNames.name: Vorbote des Gemetzels
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.){1}: Eine farblose Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Während wir zögern, sind sie auf dem Vormarsch. Sie warten nicht, während wir streiten. Mit jedem Moment rückt unser Sieg in weitere Ferne."—Gideon Jura

foreignNames.name: Precursore del Massacro
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.){1}: Una creatura incolore bersaglio ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mentre noi indugiamo, loro si muovono. Non aspetteranno che risolviamo i nostri litigi. Stiamo perdendo questa guerra attimo dopo attimo, mentre l'obiettivo scivola fuori dalla nostra portata."—Gideon Jura

foreignNames.name: 殺戮の先陣
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）{1}：無色のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「もたもたしている間にも奴らは動いている。こちらの覇権争いなど待ってはくれない。目的を定めかねている隙に戦況がますます悪化してしまう。」——ギデオン・ジュラ

foreignNames.name: 살육의 선봉
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.){1}: 무색 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리가 지체하는 동안 그 놈들은 움직이고 있어. 여기서 입씨름이나 하면서 시간을 낭비해선 안 돼. 목표가 우리 손을 벗어나면 우리는 이 전쟁에서 지고 말 거야."—기디온 주라

foreignNames.name: Pioneiro da Carnificina
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.){1}: A criatura incolor alvo ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Enquanto nos atrasamos, eles avançam. Eles não vão esperar nossas discussões. Estamos perdendo essa guerra a cada momento conforme nosso objetivo escapa do nosso alcance."— Gideon Jura

foreignNames.name: Предтеча Резни
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.){1}: целевое бесцветное существо получает Ускорение до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Пока мы медлим, они действуют. Они не будут ждать, пока мы закончим пререкаться. Теряя время, мы проигрываем войну, и наша цель ускользает все дальше».— Гидеон Джура

foreignNames.name: Precursor de la masacre
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.){1}: La criatura incolora objetivo gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mientras nosotros nos retrasamos, ellos avanzan. No se detendrán por mucho que discutamos. Estamos perdiendo esta guerra por momentos y el objetivo se nos escapa de las manos".—Gideon Jura

cards.name: Forerunner of Slaughter
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.){1}: Target colorless creature gains haste until end of turn.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}: Target colorless creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Some Eldrazi, their purpose is obvious: suck the life out of the land, birth new Eldrazi. Others aren't so obvious, and those are the ones that make me really nervous."—Chadir the Navigator

foreignNames.name: 寇基雷传令
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）你施放的无色咒语减少{1}来施放。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有些奥札奇的意图很明显：汲取大地的生机，养育新的奥札奇。而有些则不那么明显，它们才真正让我感到紧张。」～领航者洽迪

foreignNames.name: 寇基雷傳令
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）你施放的無色咒語減少{1}來施放。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有些奧札奇的意圖很明顯：汲取大地的生機，養育新的奧札奇。而有些則不那麼明顯，它們才真正讓我感到緊張。」～領航者洽迪

foreignNames.name: Héraut de Kozilek
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Les sorts incolores que vous lancez coûtent {1} de moins à lancer.
foreignNames.flavor: « L'objectif de certains Eldrazi est simple : éliminer toute trace de vie, engendrer de nouveaux Eldrazi. Pour d'autres, c'est plus difficile à déterminer, et ce sont eux qui m'inquiètent le plus. »—Chadir le navigateur

foreignNames.name: Kozileks Herold
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Farblose Zaubersprüche, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Zweck einiger Eldrazi ist klar: Leben aus dem Land saugen und neue Eldrazi gebären. Bei anderen ist es nicht so offensichtlich, und diese machen mich nervös."—Chadir der Navigator

foreignNames.name: Araldo di Kozilek
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Le magie incolori che lanci costano {1} in meno per essere lanciate.
foreignNames.flavor: "Lo scopo di alcuni Eldrazi è ovvio: estrarre la vita dalla terra e dare alla luce nuovi Eldrazi. Per altri non è così evidente, e sono quelli che mi rendono davvero nervoso."—Chadir il Navigatore

foreignNames.name: コジレックの伝令
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）あなたが無色の呪文を唱えるためのコストは{1}少なくなる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「ほとんどのエルドラージがやっていることは分かりやすい。大地の生命力を失わせ、エルドラージを生み増やしている。だが、よく分からないヤツもいる。それが気掛かりだ。」——航海士シャーディア

foreignNames.name: 코질렉의 전령
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)당신이 발동하는 무색 주문들은 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.
foreignNames.flavor: "일부 엘드라지의 목적은 분명해. 대지에서 생명을 빨아 먹고 새로운 엘드라지를 낳는 거지. 반면에 나머지 녀석들의 목적은 분명하지 않은데, 이 점이 나를 불안하게 만들어."—항해사 차디르

foreignNames.name: Arauto de Kozilek
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)As mágicas incolores que você conjura custam {1} a menos para serem conjuradas.
foreignNames.flavor: "O propósito de alguns Eldrazi é óbvio: sugar a vida da terra e gerar novos Eldrazi. Outros não são tão óbvios, e esses são os que me deixam realmente nervoso."— Chadir, o Navegador

foreignNames.name: Вестник Козилека
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Разыгрываемые вами бесцветные заклинания стоят на {1} меньше.
foreignNames.flavor: «У некоторых Эльдрази предназначение очевидно: вытягивать жизнь из земли, порождать новых Эльдрази. У других же этого не понять. И вот от них мне здорово не по себе».— Чадир-Штурман

foreignNames.name: Heraldo de Kozilek
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar los hechizos incoloros.
foreignNames.flavor: "El propósito de algunos Eldrazi es evidente: arrebatar la vida a la tierra, engendrar nuevos Eldrazi. Pero el de otros no lo es tanto, y esos son los que me inquietan más".—Chadir el navegante

cards.name: Herald of Kozilek
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Colorless spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

rulings.text: Herald of Kozilek’s last ability doesn’t change the mana cost or converted mana cost of any spell. It changes only the total cost you actually pay.
Herald of Kozilek’s last ability can’t reduce the amount of colored mana you pay for a spell. It reduces only the generic component of that mana cost.
If there are additional costs to cast a spell, or if the cost to cast a spell is increased by an effect, apply those increases before applying cost reductions.
The cost reduction can apply to alternative costs.

If a colorless spell you cast has {X} in its mana cost, you choose the value of X before calculating the spell’s total cost. For example, if that spell’s mana cost is {X}, you could choose 5 as the value of X and pay {4} to cast the spell.

Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Colorless spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.flavor: As the great scourge passed by, Zendikar shivered, then lay silent.

foreignNames.name: 阻滞君父
foreignNames.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）每当一个地在对手的操控下进战场时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶的两张牌且你抓两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 巨型祸害行过，赞迪卡颤抖，随后陷入寂静。

foreignNames.name: 阻滯君父
foreignNames.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）每當一個地在對手的操控下進戰場時，該玩家放逐其牌庫頂的兩張牌且你抽兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 巨型禍害行過，贊迪卡顫抖，隨後陷入寂靜。

foreignNames.name: Père de la stagnation
foreignNames.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle d'un adversaire, ce joueur exile les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque et vous piochez deux cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Au passage du grand fléau, Zendikar trembla, puis se tut.

foreignNames.name: Zeuger des Stillstands
foreignNames.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Immer wenn ein Land unter der Kontrolle eines Gegners ins Spiel kommt, schickt dieser Spieler die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek ins Exil und du ziehst zwei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: Als die riesige Plage vorbeizog, erschauderte Zendikar und lag anschließend still da.

foreignNames.name: Progenitore del Ristagno
foreignNames.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il controllo di un avversario, quel giocatore esilia le prime due carte del suo grimorio e tu peschi due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Al passaggio del grande flagello, Zendikar rabbrividì, poi giacque in silenzio.

foreignNames.name: 淀みの種父
foreignNames.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）土地が１つ対戦相手のコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを追放する。あなたはカードを２枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 大災害が襲うと、ゼンディカーは揺動し、そして静まった。

foreignNames.name: 침체의 종마
foreignNames.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)대지가 상대의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 추방하고 당신은 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 엄청난 재앙이 지나칠 때, 젠디카르는 두려움에 떨었다가 이내 침묵에 잠겼다.

foreignNames.name: Gerador da Estagnação
foreignNames.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob o controle de um oponente, aquele jogador exila os dois cards do topo do próprio grimório e você compra dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: Conforme o grande flagelo passava, Zendikar estremecia... e depois silenciava.

foreignNames.name: Породитель Застоя
foreignNames.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под контролем оппонента, тот игрок изгоняет две верхние карты своей библиотеки, а вы берете две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Великий бич прошелся по Зендикару, и мир содрогнулся, а затем замер в безмолвии.

foreignNames.name: Progenitor de la parálisis
foreignNames.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo el control de un oponente, ese jugador exilia las dos primeras cartas de su biblioteca y tú robas dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: Cuando el gran azote pasó, Zendikar entero se estremeció y luego quedó en silencio.

cards.name: Sire of Stagnation
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player exiles the top two cards of his or her library and you draw two cards.

rulings.text: The cards are exiled from the library face up.

If that player has one card in his or her library when Sire of Stagnation’s triggered ability resolves, that card will be exiled. If his or her library has zero cards, no cards are exiled. In both cases, you’ll still draw two cards. That player won’t lose the game (until he or she attempts to draw a card from an empty library).

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

cards.name: Ulamog's Nullifier
cards.originalText: Devoid (This card has no color.)FlashFlyingWhen Ulamog's Nullifier enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, counter target spell.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
If a spell or ability requires that you put more than one exiled card into the graveyard, you may choose cards owned by different opponents. Each card chosen will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

If a replacement effect will cause cards that would be put into a graveyard from anywhere to be exiled instead (such as the one created by Anafenza, the Foremost), you can still put an exiled card into its opponent’s graveyard. The card becomes a new object and remains in exile. In this situation, you can’t use a single exiled card if required to put more than one exiled card into the graveyard. Conversely, you could use the same card in this situation if two separate spells or abilities each required you to put a single exiled card into its owner’s graveyard.
You can’t look at face-down cards in exile unless an effect allows you to.

Face-down cards in exile are grouped using two criteria: what caused them to be exiled face down and when they were exiled face down. If you want to put a face-down card in exile into its owner’s graveyard, you must first choose one of these groups and then choose a card from within that group at random. For example, say an artifact causes your opponent to exile his or her hand of three cards face down. Then on a later turn, that artifact causes your opponent to exile another two cards face down. If you use Wasteland Strangler to put one of those cards into his or her graveyard, you would pick the first or second pile and put a card chosen at random from that pile into the graveyard.

cards.name: Bring to Light
cards.originalText: Converge — Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast Bring to Light, exile that card, then shuffle your library. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: If you cast the exiled card, you do so as part of the resolution of Bring to Light. You can’t wait to cast it later in the turn. Timing restrictions based on the card’s type are ignored, but other restrictions (such as “Cast [this card] only during combat”) are not.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay any alternative costs, such as awaken costs. You can, however, pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast the card.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X.
If you cast an instant or sorcery card this way, it goes to your graveyard as normal. It doesn’t return to exile.
If you don’t cast the card, it remains exiled.
The maximum number of colors of mana you can spend to cast a spell is five. Colorless is not a color. Note that the cost of a spell with converge may limit how many colors of mana you can spend.

If there are any alternative or additional costs to cast a spell with a converge ability, the mana spent to pay those costs will count. For example, if an effect makes sorcery spells cost {1} more to cast, you could pay {W}{U}{B}{R} to cast Radiant Flames and deal 4 damage to each creature.

If you cast a spell with converge without spending any mana to cast it (perhaps because an effect allowed you to cast it without paying its mana cost), then the number of colors spent to cast it will be zero.

If a spell with a converge ability is copied, no mana was spent to cast the copy, so the number of colors of mana spent to cast the spell will be zero. The number of colors spent to cast the original spell is not copied.

cards.name: Grove Rumbler
cards.originalText: TrampleLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Grove Rumbler gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Grove Rumbler gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "The seedlings scream for us to loose them upon the Eldrazi, and we shall oblige."

foreignNames.name: 育林德鲁伊
foreignNames.text: 奋扬～每当育林德鲁伊或另一个伙伴在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则将一个1/1绿色植物衍生生物放进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这些幼苗要我们放手让它们去攻打奥札奇，我们就如其所愿。」

foreignNames.name: 育林德魯伊
foreignNames.text: 奮揚～每當育林德魯伊或另一個伙伴在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，則將一個1/1綠色植物衍生生物放進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這些幼苗要我們放手讓他們去攻打奧札奇，我們就如其所願。」

foreignNames.name: Druides couvebosquets
foreignNames.text: Ralliement — À chaque fois que les Druides couvebosquets ou qu'un autre allié arrivent sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous pouvez payer {1}. Si vous faites ainsi, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 verte Plante.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les arbrisseaux nous supplient de les lâcher sur les Eldrazi, et nous serons ravis de leur rendre ce service. »

foreignNames.name: Haindiener-Druiden
foreignNames.text: Zusammenkunft — Immer wenn die Haindiener-Druiden oder ein anderer Verbündeter unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe einen 1/1 grünen Pflanze-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Sprösslinge flehen uns an, sie auf die Eldrazi loszulassen, und wir erfüllen ihren Wunsch."

foreignNames.name: Druidi Guardaselve
foreignNames.text: Radunare — Ogniqualvolta i Druidi Guardaselve o un altro Alleato entrano nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, puoi pagare {1}. Se lo fai, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Pianta 1/1 verde.
foreignNames.flavor: "I virgulti c'implorano a gran voce di scatenarli sugli Eldrazi e noi li asseconderemo."

foreignNames.name: 林番のドルイド
foreignNames.text: 結集 — 林番のドルイドか他の同盟者が１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは{1}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、緑の１/１の植物・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「若木がエルドラージに向けて放たれたいと訴えている。我らはその願いに応えねばならない。」

foreignNames.name: 숲 간수인 드루이드
foreignNames.text: 결집 — 숲 간수인 드루이드나 다른 동맹이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 {1}을 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 1/1 녹색 식물 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "묘목들이 엘드라지로부터 벗어나게 해 달라고 우리에게 외친다. 우리는 기꺼이 그렇게 할 것이다."

foreignNames.name: Druidas Zeladores do Bosque
foreignNames.text: Reunir — Toda vez que Druidas Zeladores do Bosque ou outro Aliado entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, você pode pagar {1}. Se fizer isso, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 1/1 do tipo Planta.
foreignNames.flavor: "As sementes gritam para que as soltemos em cima dos Eldrazi, e nós atenderemos ao pedido."

foreignNames.name: Друиды-Хранители Рощи
foreignNames.text: Сплочение — Каждый раз, когда Друиды-Хранители Рощи или другой Союзник выходят на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы можете заплатить {1}. Если вы это делаете, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 зеленое Растение.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ростки кричат, требуя выпустить их в бой с Эльдрази. Мы выполним их просьбу».

foreignNames.name: Druidas cuidarboleda
foreignNames.text: Alianza — Siempre que los Druidas cuidarboleda u otro Aliado entren al campo de batalla bajo tu control, puedes pagar {1}. Si lo haces, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Planta verde 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los retoños nos suplican que los liberemos contra los Eldrazi. Debemos obedecer".

cards.name: Grovetender Druids
cards.originalText: Rally — Whenever Grovetender Druids or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a 1/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: When an Ally enters the battlefield under your control, each rally ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If a creature with a rally ability enters the battlefield under your control at the same time as other Allies, that ability will trigger once for each of those creatures and once for the creature with the ability itself.

cards.text: Rally — Whenever Grovetender Druids or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a 1/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: 深渊宗师奇奥拉
foreignNames.text: +1：重置至多一个目标生物和至多一个目标地。−2：展示你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以将其中一张生物牌和／或一张地牌置于你手上。将其余牌置入你的坟墓场。−8：你获得具有「每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以令它与目标生物互斗」的徽记。然后将三个8/8蓝色章鱼衍生生物放进战场。

foreignNames.name: 深淵宗師奇奧拉
foreignNames.text: +1：重置至多一個目標生物和至多一個目標地。-2：展示你牌庫頂的四張牌。你可以將其中一張生物牌和／或一張地牌置於你手上。將其餘牌置入你的墳墓場。-8：你獲得具有「每當一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以令它與目標生物互鬥」的徽記。然後將三個8/8藍色章魚衍生生物放進戰場。

foreignNames.name: Kiora, maîtresse des profondeurs
foreignNames.text: +1: Dégagez jusqu'à une créature ciblée et jusqu'à un terrain ciblé.−2 : Révélez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre une carte de créature et/ou de terrain parmi elles dans votre main. Mettez le reste dans votre cimetière.−8 : Vous gagnez un emblème avec « À chaque fois qu'une créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous pouvez faire qu'elle se batte contre une créature ciblée. » Mettez ensuite sur le champ de bataille trois jetons de créature 8/8 bleue Pieuvre.

foreignNames.name: Kiora, Herrscherin der Tiefen
foreignNames.text: +1: Enttappe bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl und bis zu ein Land deiner Wahl.-2: Decke die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturenkarte und/oder eine Länderkarte auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.-8: Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Immer wenn eine Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kannst du sie gegen eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kämpfen lassen." Bringe dann drei 8/8 blaue Oktopus-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel.

foreignNames.name: Kiora, Signora delle Profondità
foreignNames.text: +1: STAPpa fino a una creatura bersaglio e fino a una terra bersaglio.−2: Rivela le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi aggiungere alla tua mano una carta creatura e/o una carta terra scelte tra esse. Metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.−8: Ottieni un emblema con "Ogniqualvolta una creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, puoi farla lottare con una creatura bersaglio". Poi metti sul campo di battaglia tre pedine creatura Piovra 8/8 blu.

foreignNames.name: 深海の主、キオーラ
foreignNames.text: ＋１：クリーチャーを最大１体と土地を最大１つ対象とし、それらをアンタップする。－２：あなたのライブラリーの一番上から４枚のカードを公開する。あなたは、その中のクリーチャー・カードを最大１枚と土地・カードを最大１枚あなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。－８：あなたは「クリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたは『その戦場に出たクリーチャーはそれと格闘を行う。』を選んでもよい。」を持つ紋章を得る。その後、青の８/８のタコ・クリーチャー・トークンを３体戦場に出す。

foreignNames.name: 심해의 지배자 키오라
foreignNames.text: +1: 최대 한 개까지의 생물과 최대 한 개까지의 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표들을 언탭한다.-2: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 공개한다. 당신은 그 중 생물 카드 한 장 및/또는 대지 카드 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.−8: 당신은 "생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 두 생물이 서로 싸우도록 할 수 있다."를 가진 휘장을 얻는다. 그 후 8/8 청색 문어 생물 토큰 세 개를 전장에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Kiora, Mestra das Profundezas
foreignNames.text: +1: Desvire até uma criatura alvo e um terreno alvo.−2: Revele os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar um card de criatura e/ou terreno dentre eles em sua mão. Coloque o restante em seu cemitério.−8: Você recebe um emblema com "Toda vez que uma criatura entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, você pode fazer com que ela lute contra a criatura alvo." Depois, coloque no campo de batalha três fichas de criatura azuis 8/8 do tipo Polvo.

foreignNames.name: Киора, Владычица Глубин
foreignNames.text: +1: разверните не более одного целевого существа и не более одной целевой земли.−2: покажите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить находящуюся среди них карту существа и (или) карту земли в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты на ваше кладбище.−8: вы получаете эмблему со способностью «Каждый раз, когда существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы можете заставить его драться с целевым существом». Затем положите на поле битвы три фишки существа 8/8 синий Спрут.

foreignNames.name: Kiora, señora de las profundidades
foreignNames.text: +1: Endereza hasta una criatura objetivo y hasta una tierra objetivo.−2: Muestra las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner en tu mano una carta de criatura y/o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon el resto en tu cementerio.−8: Obtienes un emblema con "Siempre que una criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, puedes hacer que luche contra la criatura objetivo". Luego, pon en el campo de batalla tres fichas de criatura Pulpo azules 8/8.

cards.name: Kiora, Master of the Depths
cards.originalText: +1: Untap up to one target creature and up to one target land.−2: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature." Then put three 8/8 blue Octopus creature tokens onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: You can activate Kiora’s first ability with no targets just to put a loyalty counter on her.
With Kiora’s second ability, you could put no cards, a creature card, a land card, or a creature card and a land card into your hand.
You will have the emblem by the time the Octopus creature tokens enter the battlefield—they’ll be looking to fight!

cards.text:
+1: Untap up to one target creature and up to one target land.
−2: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature." Then put three 8/8 blue Octopus creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: They came from all walks of life, from every part of Zendikar, and they returned with one unifying cause.

foreignNames.name: 墓穴行军
foreignNames.text: 将任意数量之目标伙伴生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且这些牌总法术力费用的总和须等于或小于8。
foreignNames.flavor: 他们来自各行各业，出身赞迪卡各地，为了相同的目标归返。

foreignNames.name: 墓穴行軍
foreignNames.text: 將任意數量之目標伙伴生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場，且這些牌總魔法力費用的總和須等於或小於8。
foreignNames.flavor: 他們來自各行各業，出身贊迪卡各地，為了相同的目標歸返。

foreignNames.name: Marche sépulcrale
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille, depuis votre cimetière, n'importe quel nombre de cartes de créature Allié ciblées avec un coût converti de mana total inférieur ou égal à 8.
foreignNames.flavor: Ils provenaient des quatre coins de Zendikar, de tous milieux, et revenaient servir une cause commune.

foreignNames.name: Marsch aus der Gruft
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine beliebige Anzahl an Verbündeter-Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von insgesamt 8 oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Sie kamen aus allen Gesellschaftsschichten, aus allen Ecken Zendikars, und sie kehrten alle vereint aus demselben Grund zurück.

foreignNames.name: Marcia dal Sepolcro
foreignNames.text: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia un qualsiasi numero di carte creatura Alleato bersaglio con costo di mana convertito totale pari o inferiore a 8 dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Avevano lasciato vite diverse, in luoghi sparsi per tutto Zendikar, ma tornarono uniti dalla stessa causa.

foreignNames.name: 墓所からの行進
foreignNames.text: あなたの墓地から同盟者・クリーチャー・カードを点数で見たマナ・コストの合計が８以下であるように望む枚数対象とし、それらを戦場に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: ゼンディカーの至るところから、すべての階層の人々が、１つの共通の大義を掲げ戻ってきた。

foreignNames.name: 무덤으로부터의 행진
foreignNames.text: 당신의 무덤에서 원하는 수의 동맹 생물 카드를 총 전환마나비용이 8 이하가 되도록 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 원하는 수만큼 전장으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그들은 젠디카르 전역의 각계각층에서 왔으며, 한 가지 대의를 가지고 돌아갔다.

foreignNames.name: Marcha da Tumba
foreignNames.text: Devolva de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha qualquer número de cards de criatura do tipo Aliado alvo com custo de mana convertido total igual ou inferior a 8.
foreignNames.flavor: Eles viveram todos os tipos de vida, vieram de todas as partes de Zendikar e voltaram com uma causa a uni-los.

foreignNames.name: Марш из Могилы
foreignNames.text: Верните из вашего кладбища на поле битвы любое количество целевых карт существ-Союзников с суммарной конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 8.
foreignNames.flavor: Из самых разных слоев общества и из самых разных уголков Зендикара, они вернулись, объединенные одной целью.

foreignNames.name: Marcha desde la tumba
foreignNames.text: Regresa cualquier cantidad de cartas de criatura Aliado objetivo con un coste de maná convertido total de 8 o menos de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.
foreignNames.flavor: Vinieron de toda índole, de todos los rincones de Zendikar, y regresaron con una causa que los unificaba.

cards.name: March from the Tomb
cards.originalText: Return any number of target Ally creature cards with total converted mana cost 8 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.text: Return any number of target Ally creature cards with total converted mana cost 8 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: 伏击领袖蒙达
foreignNames.text: 敏捷奋扬～每当伏击领袖蒙达或另一个伙伴在你的操控下进战场时，你可以检视你牌库顶的四张牌。若你如此作，展示其中任意数量的伙伴牌，然后将这些牌以任意顺序置于你牌库顶，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

foreignNames.name: 伏擊領袖蒙達
foreignNames.text: 敏捷奮揚～每當伏擊領袖蒙達或另一個伙伴在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以檢視你牌庫頂的四張牌。若你如此作，展示其中任意數量的伙伴牌，然後將這些牌以任意順序置於你牌庫頂，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫底。

foreignNames.name: Munda, chef d'embuscade
foreignNames.text: CéléritéRalliement — À chaque fois que Munda, chef d'embuscade ou qu'un autre allié arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous pouvez regarder les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si vous faites ainsi, révélez n'importe quel nombre de cartes d'allié parmi elles, puis mettez ces cartes au-dessus de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix et le reste, au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignNames.name: Munda, Guerillaführer
foreignNames.text: EileZusammenkunft — Immer wenn Munda, Guerillaführer, oder ein anderer Verbündeter unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kannst du dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek anschauen. Falls du dies tust, zeige eine beliebige Anzahl an Verbündeter-Karten darunter offen vor. Lege dann diese Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben auf deine Bibliothek und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Munda, Capo dell'Agguato
foreignNames.text: RapiditàRadunare — Ogniqualvolta Munda, Capo dell'Agguato o un altro Alleato entrano nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, puoi guardare le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Se lo fai, rivela un qualsiasi numero di carte Alleato scelte tra esse, poi metti quelle carte in cima al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine e le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignNames.name: 待ち伏せ隊長、ムンダ
foreignNames.text: 速攻結集 — 待ち伏せ隊長、ムンダか他の同盟者が１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたはあなたのライブラリーの一番上から４枚のカードを見てもよい。そうしたなら、その中から同盟者・カードを望む枚数公開し、それらのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に望む順番で、残りを一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: 매복조 대장 문다
foreignNames.text: 신속결집 — 매복조 대장 문다나 다른 동맹이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 볼 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 그 중에서 동맹 카드를 원하는 수만큼 공개한 다음, 그 카드들을 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서로 놓고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 원하는 순서로 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Munda, Líder de Emboscadas
foreignNames.text: Ímpet{R}eunir — Toda vez que Munda, Líder de Emboscadas, ou outro Aliado entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, você pode olhar os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório. Se fizer isso, revele qualquer número de cards do tipo Aliado dentre eles e coloque-os no topo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem. Coloque os restantes no fundo em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Мунда, Командир Засады
foreignNames.text: УскорениеСплочение — Каждый раз, когда Мунда, Командир Засады или другой Союзник выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы можете посмотреть четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Если вы это делаете, покажите любое количество находящихся среди них карт Союзников, затем положите те карты на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке, а остальные в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.

foreignNames.name: Munda, líder de la emboscada
foreignNames.text: Prisa.Alianza — Siempre que Munda, líder de la emboscada u otro Aliado entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, puedes mirar las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Si lo haces, muestra cualquier cantidad de cartas de Aliado que se encuentren entre ellas y luego pon esas cartas en la parte superior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden y el resto en el fondo en cualquier orden.

cards.name: Munda, Ambush Leader

foreignNames.name: Noyan Dar, forgeur du Roulis
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel, vous pouvez mettre trois marqueurs +1/+1 sur un terrain ciblé que vous contrôlez. Si vous faites ainsi, ce terrain devient une créature 0/0 Élémental avec la célérité qui est toujours un terrain.
foreignNames.flavor: Après des années à avoir été un ataraxmage cherchant à apaiser la fureur de Zendikar, Noyan Dar consacra son talent au contraire à la provoquer.

foreignNames.name: Noyan Dar, Turbulenzformer
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei wirkst, kannst du drei +1/+1-Marken auf ein Land deiner Wahl legen, das du kontrollierst. Falls du dies tust, wird das Land zu einer 0/0 Elementarwesen-Kreatur mit Eile. Es ist immer noch ein Land.
foreignNames.flavor: Nach vielen Jahren als Ruhezauberer, in denen Noyan Dar den Zorn Zendikars bändigte, widmet er sich nun der viel einfacheren Aufgabe, diesen Zorn zu schüren.

foreignNames.name: Noyan Dar, Plasmatore del Torbido
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia istantaneo o stregoneria, puoi mettere tre segnalini +1/+1 su una terra bersaglio che controlli. Se lo fai, quella terra diventa una creatura Elementale 0/0 con rapidità che è ancora una terra.
foreignNames.flavor: Dopo molti anni come mitigatore, Noyan Dar passò a utilizzare i suoi talenti non più per placare la furia di Zendikar, ma per il compito notevolmente più semplice di suscitarla.

foreignNames.name: 乱動を刻む者、ノヤン・ダール

foreignNames.flavor: 凪魔道士として長年働いたノヤン・ダールは、ゼンディカーの怒りを鎮めるのではなく喚起するという、ずっと簡単な仕事に転じた。

foreignNames.name: 탁류 변형사 노얀 다르

foreignNames.flavor: 미풍마도사로 지낸 지 수년 후 노얀 다르는 젠디카르의 분노를 누그러뜨리는 것이 아닌 분노를 불러일으키는 쪽에 그의 능력을 쏟았다.

foreignNames.name: Noyan Dar, Moldador do Turbilhão

cards.name: Omnath, Locus of Rage
cards.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a 5/5 red and green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.Whenever Omnath, Locus of Rage or another Elemental you control dies, Omnath deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: If Omnath dies at the same time as any other Elementals you control, Omnath’s last ability will trigger for each of them (and once for itself).
Omanth doesn’t have the land type Locus.

A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

cards.name: Roil Spout
cards.originalText: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.Awaken 4—{4}{W}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}{U}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

rulings.text: You can cast a spell with awaken for its mana cost and get only its first effect. If you cast a spell for its awaken cost, you’ll get both effects.

If the non-awaken part of the spell requires a target, you must choose a legal target. You can’t cast the spell if you can’t choose a legal target for each instance of the word “target” (though you only need a legal target for the awaken ability if you’re casting the spell for its awaken cost).

If a spell with awaken has multiple targets (including the land you control), and some but not all of those targets become illegal by the time the spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t affect the illegal targets in any way.

If the non-awaken part of the spell doesn’t require a target and you cast the spell for its awaken cost, then the spell will be countered if the target land you control becomes illegal before the spell resolves (such as due to being destroyed in response to the spell being cast).

The land will retain any other types, subtypes, or supertypes it previously had. It will also retain any mana abilities it had as a result of those subtypes. For example, a Forest that’s turned into a creature this way can still be tapped for {G}.
Awaken doesn’t give the land you control a color. As most lands are colorless, in most cases the resulting land creature will also be colorless.

cards.name: Skyrider Elf
cards.originalText: FlyingConverge — Skyrider Elf enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

rulings.text: You can choose any value for X. The value chosen for X doesn’t directly affect the number of +1/+1 counters Skyrider Elf enters the battlefield with, but it does let you pay more mana and thus spend more colors of mana to cast it. For example, you can choose 0 for the value of X and pay {G}{U} to cast Skyrider Elf for two +1/+1 counters. You can also choose 3 for the value of X, making its mana cost {3}{G}{U}, and pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} for five +1/+1 counters.
The maximum number of colors of mana you can spend to cast a spell is five. Colorless is not a color. Note that the cost of a spell with converge may limit how many colors of mana you can spend.

If there are any alternative or additional costs to cast a spell with a converge ability, the mana spent to pay those costs will count. For example, if an effect makes sorcery spells cost {1} more to cast, you could pay {W}{U}{B}{R} to cast Radiant Flames and deal 4 damage to each creature.

If you cast a spell with converge without spending any mana to cast it (perhaps because an effect allowed you to cast it without paying its mana cost), then the number of colors spent to cast it will be zero.

If a spell with a converge ability is copied, no mana was spent to cast the copy, so the number of colors of mana spent to cast the spell will be zero. The number of colors spent to cast the original spell is not copied.

cards.name: Veteran Warleader
cards.originalText: Veteran Warleader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.Tap another untapped Ally you control: Veteran Warleader gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: The ability that defines Veteran Warleader’s power and toughness works in all zones, not just the battlefield. If Veteran Warleader is on the battlefield, it will count itself.

To activate the last ability, you can tap any other untapped Ally you control, including one that hasn’t been under your control since the beginning of your most recent turn. (Note that ability doesn’t use the tap symbol.)
You choose which ability Veteran Warleader gains as the last ability resolves, not as you activate it.
Vigilance matters only as attackers are declared. Giving a creature vigilance after that point won’t untap it, even if it’s attacking.

cards.name: Aligned Hedron Network
cards.originalText: When Aligned Hedron Network enters the battlefield, exile all creatures with power 5 or greater until Aligned Hedron Network leaves the battlefield. (Those creatures return under their owners' control.)

rulings.text: Check the power of each creature as Aligned Hedron Network’s ability resolves to determine if it’s exiled. It doesn’t matter who controls the creature.
If Aligned Hedron Network exiles multiple creatures, those cards all return to the battlefield at the same time.
If Aligned Hedron Network leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, no creatures will be exiled.

Auras attached to the exiled creatures will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creatures will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creatures will cease to exist.
If a creature token is exiled, it ceases to exist. It won’t be returned to the battlefield.
The exiled cards return to the battlefield immediately after Aligned Hedron Network leaves the battlefield. Nothing happens between the two events, including state-based actions.

In a multiplayer game, if Aligned Hedron Network’s owner leaves the game, the exiled cards will return to the battlefield. Because the one-shot effect that returns the cards isn’t an ability that goes on the stack, it won’t cease to exist along with the leaving player’s spells and abilities on the stack.

In some very rare situations, Aligned Hedron Network may enter the battlefield as a creature with power 5 or greater. If this happens, Aligned Hedron Network will exile itself along with other creatures with power 5 or greater. Those cards will immediately return to the battlefield. If this causes a loop with Aligned Hedron Network continually exiling and returning itself, the game will be a draw unless a player breaks the loop somehow.

foreignNames.flavor: Einst stürzten hier Wassermassen in die Tiefe. Nun rieselt nur noch Staub und Asche von den Klippen.

foreignNames.name: Cataratta Morente
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifica la Cataratta Morente: Pesca due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Un tempo, qui scorreva acqua. Ora dai dirupi cadono solo polvere e cenere.

foreignNames.name: 荒廃した瀑布
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{5}{U}, {T}, 荒廃した瀑布を生け贄に捧げる：カードを２枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: かつては水が流れていた。今では塵と灰が滑り落ちるのみである。

foreignNames.name: 역병에 걸린 대폭포
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{5}{U}, {T}, 역병에 걸린 대폭포를 희생한다: 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 한 때 여기에는 물이 흘렀다. 하지만 이제는 절벽 위에서 떨어진 먼지와 재만 남았다.

foreignNames.name: Catarata Flagelada
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifique Catarata Flagelada: Compre dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: Já correu água aqui. Agora apenas pó e cinzas caem dos penhascos.

foreignNames.name: Порченый Водопад
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{5}{U}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порченый Водопад: возьмите две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Когда-то здесь шумела вода. Теперь с вершин утесов сыплются лишь прах и пепел.

foreignNames.name: Catarata corrompida
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{5}{U}, {T}, sacrificar la Catarata corrompida: Roba dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: Hace tiempo corría agua por aquí. Ahora de los acantilados solo cae polvo y ceniza.

cards.name: Blighted Cataract
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: "We came to a place where the skin of Zendikar was peeled back and its bones lay bare to the sky."—Greenweaver Mina

foreignNames.name: 枯萎泽地
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{4}{B}，{T}：牺牲枯萎泽地：目标对手牺牲一个生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们所处的赞迪卡，像是被剥去了一层外皮，骨骼裸露在蓝天之下。」～织碧弥娜

foreignNames.name: 枯萎澤地
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{4}{B}，{T}，犧牲枯萎澤地：目標對手犧牲一個生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我們所處的贊迪卡，像是被剝去了一層外皮，骨骼裸露在藍天之下。」～織碧彌娜

foreignNames.name: Maremme gangrenée
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{4}{B}, {T}, sacrifiez la Maremme gangrenée : L'adversaire ciblé sacrifie une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Nous avons découvert un lieu où la peau de Zendikar a été arrachée et où ses os sont exposés aux quatre vents. »—Tisseverdure Mina

foreignNames.name: Verheertes Fenn
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{4}{B}, {T}, opfere das Verheerte Fenn: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl opfert eine Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir kamen an einen Ort, an dem Zendikar die Haut abgezogen wurde und seine Knochen in der Sonne bleichten."—Grünweberin Mina

foreignNames.name: Acquitrino Morente
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Acquitrino Morente: Un avversario bersaglio sacrifica una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Siamo giunti in un luogo dove la pelle di Zendikar è stata scuoiata e le sue ossa giacciono nude sotto il firmamento."—Mina la tessitrice

foreignNames.name: 荒廃した湿原
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{4}{B}, {T}, 荒廃した湿原を生け贄に捧げる：対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「私たちが着いたのは、ゼンディカーの皮膚が剥ぎ取られ骨がむき出しになっている、そんな場所だった。」——緑織りのミーナ

foreignNames.name: 역병에 걸린 늪
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{4}{B}, {T}, 역병에 걸린 늪을 희생한다: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리는 젠디카르의 가죽이 벗겨지고 그 뼈가 하늘에 드러난 곳에 왔다."— 녹음을 엮는 미나

foreignNames.name: Charco Flagelado
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifique Charco Flagelado: O oponente alvo sacrifica uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Chegamos a um lugar onde a pele de Zendikar foi arrancada e seus ossos jazem expostos a céu aberto."— Mina trança-verde

foreignNames.name: Порченая Топь
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{4}{B}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порченую Топь: целевой оппонент жертвует существо.
foreignNames.flavor: «Мы добрались до места, где кожа Зендикара была разорвана, и его кости белели под открытым небом».— Мина из Зеленой Спирали

foreignNames.name: Marisma corrompida
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{4}{B}, {T}, sacrificar la Marisma corrompida: El oponente objetivo sacrifica una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Llegamos a un lugar donde la piel de Zendikar había sido arrancada y sus huesos relucían desnudos bajo el cielo".—Mina, tejedora verde

cards.name: Blighted Fen
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: The land is dying, but it will not go peacefully.

foreignNames.name: 枯萎峡谷
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{4}{R}，{T}，牺牲枯萎峡谷：枯萎峡谷对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地正在消亡，但它不会平静地离开。

foreignNames.name: 枯萎峽谷
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{4}{R}，{T}，犧牲枯萎峽谷：枯萎峽谷對目標生物或玩家造成2點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地正在消亡，但它不會平靜地離開。

foreignNames.name: Gorge gangrenée
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{4}{R}, {T}, sacrifiez la Gorge gangrenée : La Gorge gangrenée inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: La nature se meurt, mais elle ne succombera pas sans se battre.

foreignNames.name: Verheerte Schlucht
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{4}{R}, {T}, opfere die Verheerte Schlucht: Die Verheerte Schlucht fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Land stirbt, aber es wird sich nicht wehrlos seinem Schicksal ergeben.

foreignNames.name: Gola Morente
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifica la Gola Morente: La Gola Morente infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: La terra sta morendo, ma non se ne andrà placidamente.

foreignNames.name: 荒廃した山峡
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{4}{R}, {T}, 荒廃した山峡を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。荒廃した山峡はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地は死にかかっている。しかもその死は安らかではない。

foreignNames.name: 역병에 걸린 협곡
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{4}{R}, {T}, 역병에 걸린 협곡을 희생한다: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 역병에 걸린 협곡은 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 대지가 고통스럽게 죽어 가고 있다.

foreignNames.name: Desfiladeiro Flagelado
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifique Desfiladeiro Flagelado: Desfiladeiro Flagelado causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: A terra está morrendo, mas não sucumbirá de forma pacífica.

foreignNames.name: Порченая Теснина
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{4}{R}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порченую Теснину: Порченая Теснина наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: Земля умирает, но она не готова угаснуть мирно.

foreignNames.name: Desfiladero corrompido
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{4}{R}, {T}, sacrificar el Desfiladero corrompido: El Desfiladero corrompido hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: La tierra está muriendo, pero no se irá sin luchar.

cards.name: Blighted Gorge
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Gorge: Blighted Gorge deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Gorge: Blighted Gorge deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: "When a limb is gangrenous, you cut it off. This is no different."—Greenweaver Mina

foreignNames.name: 枯萎草原
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{3}{W}，{T}，牺牲枯萎草原：你每操控一个生物，便获得2点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「当躯体坏疽时，便要割除。这里也一样。」～织碧弥娜

foreignNames.name: 枯萎草原
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{3}{W}，{T}：犧牲枯萎草原：你每操控一個生物，便獲得2點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「當軀體壞疽時，便要割除。這裡也一樣。」～織碧彌娜

foreignNames.name: Steppes gangrenées
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{3}{W}, {T}, sacrifiez les Steppes gangrenées : Vous gagnez 2 points de vie pour chaque créature que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: « Quand un organe a la gangrène, on le coupe. C'est le même principe. »—Tisseverdure Mina

foreignNames.name: Verheerte Steppe
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{3}{W}, {T}, opfere die Verheerte Steppe: Du erhältst für jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wenn du an deinen Gliedmaßen Wundbrand entdeckst, trennst du sie ab. Dies ist nichts anderes."—Grünweberin Mina

foreignNames.name: Steppa Morente
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifica la Steppa Morente: Guadagni 2 punti vita per ogni creatura che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: "Quando un arto va in cancrena, si amputa. Qui non c'è alcuna differenza."—Mina la tessitrice

foreignNames.name: 荒廃した草原
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{3}{W}, {T}, 荒廃した草原を生け贄に捧げる：あなたは、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体につき２点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「壊疽した足は切り落とすでしょう。これも同じよ。」——緑織りのミーナ

foreignNames.name: 역병에 걸린 초원
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{3}{W}, {T}, 역병에 걸린 초원을 희생한다: 당신은 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개당 생명 2점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "사지가 썩어가고 있다면 잘라내 버려. 그래도 별 차이 없으니깐."— 녹음을 엮는 미나

foreignNames.name: Estepe Flagelada
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifique Estepe Flagelada: Você ganha 2 pontos de vida para cada criatura que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Quando um membro gangrena, você decepa. Isso aqui não é diferente."— Mina trança-verde

foreignNames.name: Порченая Степь
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{3}{W}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порченую Степь: вы получаете 2 жизни за каждое существо под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: «Если в ноге началась гангрена, ее нужно отнять. Здесь то же самое».— Мина из Зеленой Спирали

foreignNames.name: Estepa corrompida
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{3}{W}, {T}, sacrificar la Estepa corrompida: Ganas 2 vidas por cada criatura que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Si un miembro se gangrena, hay que cortarlo. Esto no es diferente".—Mina, tejedora verde

cards.name: Blighted Steppe
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Steppe: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

rulings.text: Count the number of creatures you control as the last ability resolves to determine how much life to gain.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Steppe: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

foreignNames.name: 枯萎林地
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{3}{G}，{T}，牺牲枯萎林地：从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，并将它们横置放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 枯萎林地
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{3}{G}，{T}，犧牲枯萎林地：從你的牌庫中搜尋至多兩張基本地牌，並將它們橫置放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

foreignNames.name: Sylves gangrenées
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{3}{G}, {T}, sacrifiez les Sylves gangrenées : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque jusqu'à deux cartes de terrain de base et mettez-les sur le champ de bataille engagées. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Verheertes Waldland
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{3}{G}, {T}, opfere das Verheerte Waldland: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach bis zu zwei Standardland-Karten und bringe diese getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Boscaglia Morente
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifica la Boscaglia Morente: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per trovare fino a due carte terra base e mettile sul campo di battaglia TAPpate. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 荒廃した森林
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{3}{G}, {T}, 荒廃した森林を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カードを最大２枚探し、それらをタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 역병에 걸린 삼림지
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{3}{G}, {T}, 역병에 걸린 삼림지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 최대 두 장까지의 기본 대지 카드를 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다. 그 후 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Floresta Flagelada
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifique Floresta Flagelada: Procure em seu grimório até dois cards de terreno básico e coloque-os no campo de batalha virados. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: Порченый Лес
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{3}{G}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порченый Лес: найдите в вашей библиотеке не более двух карт базовых земель и положите их на поле битвы повернутыми. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: Arboleda corrompida
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{3}{G}, {T}, sacrificar la Arboleda corrompida: Busca en tu biblioteca hasta dos cartas de tierra básica y ponlas en el campo de batalla giradas. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

cards.name: Blighted Woodland
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The continent of Murasa lies beneath a blanket of dense vegetation, its enormous branches tangled so thickly that some inhabitants never see the ground.

foreignNames.name: 林冠远景
foreignNames.text: （{T}：加{G}或{W}到你的法术力池中。）除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则林冠远景须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 姆拉撒大陆上覆厚密植被，庞巨盘枝交错横生，尚有居民从未见过其下大地。

foreignNames.name: 林冠遠景
foreignNames.text: （{T}：加{G}或{W}到你的魔法力池中）。除非你操控兩個或更多基本地，否則林冠遠景須橫置進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 姆拉撒大陸上覆厚密植被，龐巨盤枝交錯橫生，尚有居民從未見過其下大地。

foreignNames.name: Vue de la canopée
foreignNames.text: ({T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W} à votre réserve.)La Vue de la canopée arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux terrains de base.
foreignNames.flavor: Le continent de Murasa est protégé par une épaisse couche de végétation, dont les énormes branches s'enchevêtrent si étroitement que certains habitants ne voient jamais le sol.

foreignNames.name: Blätterdach-Panorama
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G} oder {W}.)Das Blätterdach-Panorama kommt getappt ins Spiel, falls du nicht zwei oder mehr Standardländer kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Kontinent Murasa liegt unter einem dichten Blätterdach verborgen, die Vegetation so verwachsen, dass seine Einwohner niemals den Boden erblicken.

foreignNames.name: Panorama di Fronde
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W} alla tua riserva di mana.)Il Panorama di Fronde entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli due o più terre base.
foreignNames.flavor: Il continente di Murasa giace sotto una coltre di fitta vegetazione, dagli enormi rami aggrovigliati così strettamente che alcuni dei suoi abitanti non vedono mai il suolo.

foreignNames.name: 梢の眺望
foreignNames.text: （{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}か{W}を加える。）あなたが２つ以上の基本土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、梢の眺望はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: ムラーサ大陸は密生する植生に覆われている。巨大な木々の曲がりくねった枝が稠密に重なっており、ここに住む人々の中には、地面を見たことのない者もいる。

foreignNames.name: 숲 전망대
foreignNames.text: ({T}: {G} 또는 {W}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.)숲 전망대는 당신이 다른 기본 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: 무라사 대륙 위에는 무성한 수풀 장막이 놓여 있다. 거대한 가지들이 두껍게 얽혀 있어, 이곳의 주민은 지상을 볼 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Vista do Dossel
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Adicione {G} ou {W} à sua reserva de mana.)Vista do Dossel entra no campo de batalha virada a menos que você controle dois ou mais terrenos básicos.
foreignNames.flavor: O continente de Murasa fica sob um manto de densa vegetação, seus galhos enormes tão densamente emaranhados que alguns habitantes jamais veem o chão.

foreignNames.name: Дорога Среди Крон
foreignNames.text: ({T}: добавьте {G} или {W} в ваше хранилище маны.)Дорога Среди Крон выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если только под вашим контролем нет двух или более базовых земель.
foreignNames.flavor: Весь континент Мураса покрывают дремучие леса. Огромные ветви деревьев переплетаются так плотно, что некоторые обитатели крон живут и умирают, ни разу не увидев земли.

foreignNames.name: Panorámica de la enramada
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Agrega {G} o {W} a tu reserva de maná.)La Panorámica de la enramada entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles dos o más tierras básicas.
foreignNames.flavor: El continente de Murasa se oculta bajo una espesa capa de vegetación. Las enormes ramas que lo cubren están tan enredadas que algunos de sus habitantes jamás llegan a ver el suelo.

cards.name: Canopy Vista
cards.originalText: ({T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.)Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

rulings.text: Even though these lands have basic land types, they are not basic lands because “basic” doesn’t appear on their type line. Notably, controlling two or more of them won’t allow others to enter the battlefield untapped.

However, because these cards have basic land types, effects that specify a basic land type without also specifying that the land be basic can affect them. For example, a spell or ability that reads “Destroy target Forest” can target Canopy Vista, while one that reads “Destroy target basic Forest” cannot.
If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of basic lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

cards.flavor: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

foreignNames.name: 烬火林地
foreignNames.text: （{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。）除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则烬火林地须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 阿库姆火山大陆上，奇异草木簇生喷气裂口，嶙峋尖峰直伸天际云霄。

foreignNames.name: 燼火林地
foreignNames.text: （{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的魔法力池中。）除非你操控兩個或更多基本地，否則燼火林地須橫置進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 阿庫姆火山大陸上，奇異草木簇生噴氣裂口，嶙峋尖峰直伸天際雲霄。

foreignNames.name: Clairière de scories
foreignNames.text: ({T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G} à votre réserve.)La Clairière de scories arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux terrains de base.
foreignNames.flavor: Sur le continent volcanique d'Akoum, d'étranges végétaux s'amassent autour des fissures de gaz et les pics irréguliers de la montagne se dressent haut dans le ciel.

foreignNames.name: Zunderwald-Lichtung
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R} oder {G}.)Die Zunderwald-Lichtung kommt getappt ins Spiel, falls du nicht zwei oder mehr Standardländer kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf dem vulkanischen Kontinent Akoum ragen bizarre Gewächse, Gasschlote und zerklüftete Berggipfel hoch in die Lüfte.

foreignNames.name: Radura delle Braci
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.)La Radura delle Braci entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli due o più terre base.
foreignNames.flavor: Nel continente vulcanico di Akoum, la bizzarra vegetazione si ammassa attorno agli sfiatatoi di gas, mentre frastagliati picchi montuosi s'innalzano verso il cielo.

foreignNames.name: 燃えがらの林間地
foreignNames.text: （{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{G}を加える。）あなたが２つ以上の基本土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、燃えがらの林間地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 火山の大陸アクームでは、噴気孔の周囲に奇妙な植生が見られる。空高くギザギザの山頂もそびえている。

foreignNames.name: 잿더미 숲
foreignNames.text: ({T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.)잿더미 숲은 당신이 다른 기본 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: 화산 대륙 아쿰에는 기이한 수풀이 가스 분출구 주변에 떼지어 있고, 삐죽삐죽한 산 봉우리가 하늘 높이 치솟아 있다.

foreignNames.name: Clareira das Cinzas

foreignNames.flavor: No continente vulcânico de Akoum, uma vegetação bizarra se aglomera em torno de fissuras gasosas, enquanto os picos escarpados das monhtanhas flutuam nos céus.

foreignNames.name: Тлеющая Поляна
foreignNames.text: ({T}: добавьте {R} или {G} в ваше хранилище маны.)Тлеющая Поляна выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если только под вашим контролем нет двух или более базовых земель.
foreignNames.flavor: На вулканическом континенте Акум причудливые растения окружают газовые гейзеры, а изломанные горные пики поднимаются высоко в небо.

foreignNames.name: Claro de ceniza
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Agrega {R} o {G} a tu reserva de maná.)El Claro de ceniza entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles dos o más tierras básicas.
foreignNames.flavor: En el continente volcánico de Akoum hay fumarolas con extrañas parcelas de hierba en torno a ellas, y las cumbres escarpadas de las montañas se alzan muy alto en el cielo.

cards.flavor: The Eldrazi may be ruthless, but Zendikar is relentless.

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲成形野地：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 奥札奇或许无情，但赞迪卡亦很坚韧。

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，犧牲成形野地：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，並將之橫置放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 奧札奇或許無情，但贊迪卡亦很堅韌。

foreignNames.name: Étendues sauvages en évolution
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez les Étendues sauvages en évolution : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Si les Eldrazi sont impitoyables, Zendikar est quant à lui inexorable.

foreignNames.name: Sich entfaltende Wildnis
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Sich entfaltende Wildnis: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte und bringe sie getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Eldrazi mögen unbarmherzig sein, doch Zendikar ist unnachgiebig.

foreignNames.name: Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica le Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base e mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli Eldrazi sono spietati, ma Zendikar è instancabile.

foreignNames.name: 進化する未開地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 進化する未開地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カードを１枚探し、それをタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: エルドラージは冷酷だが、ゼンディカーも執拗だ。

foreignNames.name: 진화하는 야생지
foreignNames.text: {T}, 진화하는 야생지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다. 그 후 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 엘드라지는 무자비할지 모르지만 젠디카르는 가차없다.

foreignNames.name: Terras em Desenvolvimento
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifique Terras em Desenvolvimento: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Eldrazi podem ser impiedosos, mas Zendikar é incansável.

foreignNames.name: Перерождающиеся Дебри
foreignNames.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Перерождающиеся Дебри: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли и положите ее на поле битвы повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Эльдрази беспощадны, но Зендикар непреклонен.

foreignNames.name: Terrenos expansivos
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar los Terrenos expansivos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica y ponla en el campo de batalla girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Los Eldrazi pueden ser implacables, pero Zendikar es incansable.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

foreignNames.name: 茂密灌丛
foreignNames.text: 茂密灌丛须横置进战场。当茂密灌丛进战场时，你可以检视你牌库顶的五张牌。若你如此作，则展示其中至多一张基本地牌，然后将该牌置于你的牌库顶，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库底。{T}：加{G}到你的法术力池中。

foreignNames.name: 茂密灌叢
foreignNames.text: 茂密灌叢須橫置進戰場。當茂密灌叢進戰場時，你可以檢視你牌庫頂的五張牌。若你如此作，則展示其中至多一張基本地牌，然後將該牌置於你的牌庫頂，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫底。{T}：加{G}到你的魔法力池中。

foreignNames.name: Halliers fertiles
foreignNames.text: Les Halliers fertiles arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagés.Quand les Halliers fertiles arrivent sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez regarder les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si vous faites ainsi, révélez jusqu'à une carte de terrain de base parmi elles, puis mettez cette carte au-dessus de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.{T} : Ajoutez {G} à votre réserve.

foreignNames.name: Fruchtbares Dickicht
foreignNames.text: Das Fruchtbare Dickicht kommt getappt ins Spiel.Wenn das Fruchtbare Dickicht ins Spiel kommt, kannst du dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek anschauen. Falls du dies tust, zeige bis zu eine Standardland-Karte darunter offen vor. Lege dann diese Karte oben auf deine Bibliothek und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G}.

foreignNames.name: Boschetto Fertile
foreignNames.text: Il Boschetto Fertile entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.Quando il Boschetto Fertile entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi guardare le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Se lo fai, rivela fino a una carta terra base scelta tra esse, poi metti quella carta in cima al tuo grimorio e le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.{T}: Aggiungi {G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignNames.name: 肥沃な茂み
foreignNames.text: 肥沃な茂みはタップ状態で戦場に出る。肥沃な茂みが戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを見てもよい。そうしたなら、その中の基本土地・カードを最大１枚公開し、そのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に、残りを一番下に望む順番で置く。{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。

foreignNames.name: 비옥한 덤불
foreignNames.text: 비옥한 덤불은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.비옥한 덤불이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 볼 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 그 중에서 기본 대지 카드를 최대 한 장까지 공개한 다음 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 놓고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 원하는 순서로 놓는다.{T}: {G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignNames.name: Arvoredo Fértil
foreignNames.text: Arvoredo Fértil entra no campo de batalha virado.Quando Arvoredo Fértil entra no campo de batalha, você pode olhar os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Se fizer isso, revele até um card de terreno básico dentre eles e depois coloque aquele card no topo de seu grimório e o restante no fundo em qualquer ordem.{T}: Adicione {G} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignNames.name: Плодородные Заросли
foreignNames.text: Плодородные Заросли выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.Когда Плодородные Заросли выходят на поле битвы, вы можете посмотреть пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Если вы это делаете, покажите не более одной находящейся среди них карты базовой земли, затем положите ту карту на верх вашей библиотеки, а остальные в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.{T}: добавьте {G} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignNames.name: Maleza fértil
foreignNames.text: La Maleza fértil entra al campo de batalla girada.Cuando la Maleza fértil entre al campo de batalla, puedes mirar las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Si lo haces, muestra hasta una carta de tierra básica que se encuentre entre ellas y luego pon esa carta en la parte superior de tu biblioteca y el resto en el fondo en cualquier orden.{T}: Agrega {G} a tu reserva de maná.

cards.name: Fertile Thicket
cards.originalText: Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.When Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one basic land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in any order.{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: You don’t have to reveal a basic land card from among the five cards you look at, even if one is there. If you don’t, you won’t put a card on top of your library.
