cards.name: Lumbering Falls
cards.originalText: Lumbering Falls enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.{2}{G}{U}: Lumbering Falls becomes a 3/3 green and blue Elemental creature with hexproof until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: A land that becomes a creature may be affected by “summoning sickness.” You can’t attack with it or use any of its {T} abilities (including its mana abilities) unless it began your most recent turn on the battlefield under your control. Note that summoning sickness cares about when that permanent came under your control, not when it became a creature nor when it entered the battlefield.
This land is colorless until the last ability gives it colors.

When a land becomes a creature, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. The permanent was already on the battlefield; it only changed its types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.

An ability that turns a land into a creature also sets that creature’s power and toughness. If the land was already a creature (for example, if it was the target of a spell with awaken), this will overwrite the previous effect that set its power and toughness. Effects that modify its power or toughness will continue to apply no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for counters that change its power or toughness (such as +1/+1 counters) and effects that switch its power and toughness. For example, if Lumbering Falls has been made a 0/0 creature with three +1/+1 counters on it, activating its last ability will turn it into a 6/6 creature that’s still a land.

cards.name: Prairie Stream
cards.originalText: ({T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.)Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

rulings.text: Even though these lands have basic land types, they are not basic lands because “basic” doesn’t appear on their type line. Notably, controlling two or more of them won’t allow others to enter the battlefield untapped.

However, because these cards have basic land types, effects that specify a basic land type without also specifying that the land be basic can affect them. For example, a spell or ability that reads “Destroy target Forest” can target Canopy Vista, while one that reads “Destroy target basic Forest” cannot.
If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of basic lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

foreignNames.text: Exaustor Trôpego entra no campo de batalha virado.{T}: Adicione {W} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.{1}{W}{B}: Exaustor Trôpego torna-se uma criatura branca e preta 2/3 do tipo Elemental com vínculo com a vida até o final do turno. Ela ainda é um terreno.

foreignNames.name: Бродячее Жерло

foreignNames.name: Fumarolas reptantes
foreignNames.text: Las Fumarolas reptantes entran al campo de batalla giradas.{T}: Agrega {W} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.{1}{W}{B}: Las Fumarolas reptantes se convierten en una criatura Elemental blanca y negra 2/3 con la habilidad de vínculo vital hasta el final del turno. Siguen siendo una tierra.

cards.name: Shambling Vent
cards.originalText: Shambling Vent enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.{1}{W}{B}: Shambling Vent becomes a 2/3 white and black Elemental creature with lifelink until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: Multiple instances of lifelink are redundant. Activating the last ability more than once won’t cause you to gain additional life if Shambling Vent deals damage.

A land that becomes a creature may be affected by “summoning sickness.” You can’t attack with it or use any of its {T} abilities (including its mana abilities) unless it began your most recent turn on the battlefield under your control. Note that summoning sickness cares about when that permanent came under your control, not when it became a creature nor when it entered the battlefield.
This land is colorless until the last ability gives it colors.

When a land becomes a creature, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. The permanent was already on the battlefield; it only changed its types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.

An ability that turns a land into a creature also sets that creature’s power and toughness. If the land was already a creature (for example, if it was the target of a spell with awaken), this will overwrite the previous effect that set its power and toughness. Effects that modify its power or toughness will continue to apply no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for counters that change its power or toughness (such as +1/+1 counters) and effects that switch its power and toughness. For example, if Shambling Vent has been made a 0/0 creature with three +1/+1 counters on it, activating its last ability will turn it into a 5/6 creature that’s still a land.

cards.text:

cards.flavor: The gods known to the merfolk as Ula, Emeria, and Cosi were nothing more than false memories of a monstrous trinity: the Eldrazi titans Ulamog, Emrakul, and Kozilek.

foreignNames.name: 弃神祭祠
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{T}：加{2}到你的法术力池中。此法术力只能用来施放无色咒语。只能于你操控七个或更多地时起动此异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 人鱼称为钨拉、伊美黎和寇希的神明，不过是对恐怖三体～钨拉莫、伊莫库和寇基雷这三个庞巨奥札奇的错误记忆。

foreignNames.name: 棄神祭祠

foreignNames.name: Reliquaire des Dieux abandonnés
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{T} : Ajoutez {2} à votre réserve. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer des sorts incolores. N'activez cette capacité que si vous contrôlez au moins sept terrains.
foreignNames.flavor: Les dieux Ula, Éméria et Cosi des ondins n'étaient en réalité que des souvenirs pervertis de la trinité monstrueuse des titans Eldrazi : Ulamog, Emrakul et Kozilek.

foreignNames.name: Schrein der vergessenen Götter
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {2}. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um farblose Zaubersprüche zu wirken. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls du sieben oder mehr Länder kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Gottheiten, die dem Meervolk als Ula, Emeria und Cosi bekannt sind, waren nichts weiter als falsche Erinnerungen an die drei monströsen Eldrazi-Titanen Ulamog, Emrakul und Kozilek.

foreignNames.name: Santuario degli Dei Rinnegati
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{T}: Aggiungi {2} alla tua riserva di mana. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare magie incolori. Attiva questa abilità solo se controlli sette o più terre.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli dei noti ai tritoni come Ula, Emeria e Cosi non erano altro che falsi ricordi di una mostruosa trinità: i titani Eldrazi Ulamog, Emrakul e Kozilek.

foreignNames.name: 見捨てられた神々の神殿
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{2}を加える。このマナは、無色の呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用できる。この能力は、あなたが７つ以上の土地をコントロールしているときにのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.flavor: マーフォークがウーラ、エメリア、コーシと呼び崇めていた三神は、実際にはウラモグ、エムラクール、コジレックという三大エルドラージの誤った記憶でしかなかった。

foreignNames.name: 버림받은 신들의 성소
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{T}: {2}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. 이 마나는 무색 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다. 이 능력은 당신이 대지를 일곱 개 이상 조종할 때에만 활성화할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 인어들에게 신으로 알려진 울라, 에메리아와 코시는 괴기스러운 삼위일체인 엘드라지 거신 울라목, 엠라쿨과 코질렉의 거짓 기억에 불과했다.

foreignNames.name: Santuário dos Deuses Esquecidos
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{T}: Adicione {2} à sua reserva de mana. Gaste este mana apenas para conjurar mágicas incolores. Ative esta habilidade somente se você controlar sete ou mais terrenos.
foreignNames.flavor: Os deuses conhecidos pelos tritões como Ula, Emeria e Cosi não passavam de falsas lembranças de uma trindade monstruosa: os titãs Eldrazi Ulamog, Emrakul e Kozilek.

foreignNames.name: Храм Забытых Богов
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{T}: добавьте {2} в ваше хранилище маны. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание бесцветных заклинаний. Активируйте эту способность, только если вы контролируете не менее семи земель.
foreignNames.flavor: Боги, которых мерфолки называли Улой, Эмерией и Коси, были лишь ложными воспоминаниями о чудовищной троице титанов Эльдрази: Уламоге, Эмракул и Козилеке.

foreignNames.name: Altar de los dioses olvidados
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{T}: Agrega {2} a tu reserva de maná. Usa este maná solo para lanzar hechizos incoloros. Activa esta habilidad solo si controlas siete o más tierras.
foreignNames.flavor: Los dioses que los tritones conocían como Ula, Emeria y Cosi no eran más que recuerdos falsos de la monstruosa trinidad compuesta por los titanes Eldrazi: Ulamog, Emrakul y Kozilek.

cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells. Activate this ability only if you control seven or more lands.
cards.text:

foreignNames.text: La Cascata dell'Orizzonte entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.Quando la Cascata dell'Orizzonte entra nel campo di battaglia, una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.{T}: Aggiungi {U} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignNames.name: Небесный Каскад

foreignNames.name: Cascada del horizonte
foreignNames.text: La Cascada del horizonte entra al campo de batalla girada.Cuando la Cascada del horizonte entre al campo de batalla, la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.{T}: Agrega {U} a tu reserva de maná.

cards.name: Skyline Cascade
cards.originalText: Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield tapped.When Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: Skyline Cascade’s triggered ability doesn’t tap the creature. It can target any creature, tapped or untapped. If that creature is already untapped at the beginning of its controller’s next untap step, the effect won’t do anything.

The triggered ability tracks the creature, but not its controller. If the creature changes controllers before its first controller’s next untap step has come around, then it won’t untap during its new controller’s next untap step.

cards.text:
Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield tapped.
When Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

foreignNames.flavor: 古墜茲大陸這片地熱沼澤熱氣蒸騰，腐臭瀰漫。

foreignNames.flavor: Der Kontinent Guul Draz ist ein geothermisches Sumpfland, in dem die Luft vor Hitze und fauligem Gestank flimmert.

foreignNames.text: ({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R} alla tua riserva di mana.)La Palude Rovente entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli due o più terre base.
foreignNames.flavor: Il continente di Guul Draz è un terreno geotermico paludoso che puzza di afa e putrefazione.

foreignNames.text: （{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{R}を加える。）あなたが２つ以上の基本土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、燻る湿地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: グール・ドラズ大陸は温沼地である。地熱による高温と腐敗で燻っている。

foreignNames.name: 그을린 습지
foreignNames.text: ({T}: {B} 또는 {R}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.)그을린 습지는 당신이 다른 기본 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: 굴 드라즈 대륙은 열기와 썩은 냄새를 풍기는 지열 늪지대이다.

foreignNames.name: Pântano Ardente
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Adicione {B} ou {R} à sua reserva de mana.)Pântano Ardente entra no campo de batalha virado a menos que você controle dois ou mais terrenos básicos.
foreignNames.flavor: O continente de Guul Draz é um grande pântano geotérmico abafado e decadente.

foreignNames.name: Тлеющее Болото
foreignNames.text: ({T}: добавьте {B} или {R} в ваше хранилище маны.)Тлеющее Болото выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если только под вашим контролем нет двух или более базовых земель.
foreignNames.flavor: Континент Гуул-Драз — разогретое подземным теплом болото, от которого исходят душные гнилостные пары.

foreignNames.name: Cenagal ardiente
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Agrega {B} o {R} a tu reserva de maná.)El Cenagal ardiente entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles dos o más tierras básicas.
foreignNames.flavor: El continente de Guul Draz es una ciénaga geotérmica que respira calor y putrefacción.

cards.name: Smoldering Marsh
cards.originalText: ({T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.)Smoldering Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

rulings.text: Even though these lands have basic land types, they are not basic lands because “basic” doesn’t appear on their type line. Notably, controlling two or more of them won’t allow others to enter the battlefield untapped.

However, because these cards have basic land types, effects that specify a basic land type without also specifying that the land be basic can affect them. For example, a spell or ability that reads “Destroy target Forest” can target Canopy Vista, while one that reads “Destroy target basic Forest” cannot.
If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of basic lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.)
Smoldering Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor: Young Eldrazi crawl forth from the dust, compelled by a greater will.

foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{6}，{T}，牺牲孳息温床：将三个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{6}, {T}, 부화지를 희생한다: 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 세 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물들은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.

foreignNames.name: Ложе Порождения
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{6}, {T}, пожертвуйте Ложе Порождения: положите на поле битвы три фишки существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Они имеют способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Юные Эльдрази выбираются из праха, подчиняясь воле повелителя.

foreignNames.name: Lecho de crianza
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{6}, {T}, sacrificar el Lecho de crianza: Pon en el campo de batalla tres fichas de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incoloras 1/1. Tienen "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: Los jóvenes Eldrazi surgen reptando del polvo, impulsados por una voluntad más poderosa que ellos.

cards.name: Spawning Bed
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {1} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: On the continent of Tazeem, rushing waters plunge through narrow canyons into mist-cloaked lakes.

foreignNames.name: 沉落幽谷
foreignNames.text: （{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。）除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则沉落幽谷须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 塔晋大陆上，湍急河水涌经迫窄峡谷，奔腾激流直入雾漫湖泊。

foreignNames.name: 沉落幽谷
foreignNames.text: （{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的魔法力池中。）除非你操控兩個或更多基本地，否則沉落幽谷須橫置進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 塔晉大陸上，湍急河水湧經迫窄峽谷，奔騰激流直入霧漫湖泊。

foreignNames.name: Dépression engloutie
foreignNames.text: ({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B} à votre réserve.)La Dépression engloutie arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux terrains de base.
foreignNames.flavor: Sur le continent de Tazeem, les eaux tumultueuses passent dans des gorges étroites et se jettent dans des lacs embrumés.

foreignNames.name: Versunkener Talkessel
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U} oder {B}.)Der Versunkene Talkessel kommt getappt ins Spiel, falls du nicht zwei oder mehr Standardländer kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf dem Kontinent Tazeem stürzen rauschende Ströme enge Schluchten hinab, in nebelverhangene Seen.

foreignNames.name: Conca Infossata
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.)La Conca Infossata entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli due o più terre base.
foreignNames.flavor: Sul continente di Tazeem, acque impetuose si tuffano attraverso strette gole in laghi ammantati di nebbia.

foreignNames.name: 窪み渓谷
foreignNames.text: （{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}か{B}を加える。）あなたが２つ以上の基本土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、窪み渓谷はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: タジーム大陸の急流は、狭い渓谷を抜けると霧に覆われた湖へと流れ込む。

foreignNames.name: 침몰된 골짜기
foreignNames.text: ({T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.)침몰된 골짜기는 당신이 다른 기본 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: 타짐 대륙에는 급류가 좁은 협곡을 타고 내려와 안개 덮인 호수에 도달한다.

foreignNames.name: Vale Afundado
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Adicione {U} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.)Vale Afundado entra no campo de batalha virado a menos que você controle dois ou mais terrenos básicos.
foreignNames.flavor: No continente de Tazeem, corredeiras velozes mergulham por cânions estreitos rumo a lagos ocultos nas brumas.

foreignNames.name: Затопленная Лощина
foreignNames.text: ({T}: добавьте {U} или {B} в ваше хранилище маны.)Затопленная Лощина выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если только под вашим контролем нет двух или более базовых земель.
foreignNames.flavor: На континенте Тазим бурные реки несутся по узким каньонам, впадая в укрытые туманом озера.

foreignNames.name: Hondonada profunda
foreignNames.text: ({T}: Agrega {U} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.)La Hondonada profunda entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles dos o más tierras básicas.
foreignNames.flavor: En el continente de Tazeem, los ríos se abren paso a través de estrechos cañones y terminan en lagos sumidos en la niebla.

cards.name: Sunken Hollow
cards.originalText: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.)Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

rulings.text: Even though these lands have basic land types, they are not basic lands because “basic” doesn’t appear on their type line. Notably, controlling two or more of them won’t allow others to enter the battlefield untapped.

However, because these cards have basic land types, effects that specify a basic land type without also specifying that the land be basic can affect them. For example, a spell or ability that reads “Destroy target Forest” can target Canopy Vista, while one that reads “Destroy target basic Forest” cannot.
If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of basic lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.)
Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
